ICICI BANK 154 RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER DATE: JANUARY 20,2020 REF. NO. CAL 1244656752348 WEST COAST PAPER MILLS LIMITED BANGUR NAGAR DANDELI KARNATAKA - 481325 ATTENTION: MR. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENT. TENURE 12 MONTHS VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19, 2020 DIVISION WISE LIMIT THE FACILITY IS MADE AVAILABLE FOR THE COMPANY AS A WHOLE, WITHOUT REFERENCE / RESTRICTION TO ANY PARTICULAR DIVISION OF THE COMPANY. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN NON-FUND BASED AND FUND BASED LIMIT REPAYMENT TERMS THE BORROWER SHALL, UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED TO BY THE BANK, REPAY TO THE BANK FORTHWITH ON DEMAND SUCH OF THE AMOUNT AS MAY BE OUTSTANDING OF THE RELEVANT ACCOUNT IN RESPECT OF THE CASH CREDIT FACILITY, TOGETHER WITH ALL INTEREST, COSTS, CHARGES, EXPENSES AND MONIES WHATSOEVER STIPULATED IN, OR PAYABLE UNDER, THE FACILITY AGREEMENT AND/OR THE OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT. PRICING THE RATE OF INTEREST STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK SHALL BE SUM OF 1- ANA 4 12072017.V1I ICICI BANK MCLR-6M AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM OF I- MCLR-6M, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY, ON THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT O THE LOAN REMAINS OUTSTANDING EACH DAY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES MARGIN INVENTORY - UNIFORM MARGIN OF 25% AGAINST ALL COMPONENTS OF INVENTORY . BOOK DEBTS COVER PERIOD: 90 DAYS MARGIN: 25% LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOANS: FACILITY NAME LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOAN (LOCSTL) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC) EXISTING LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC CURRENCY RUPEE FACILITY PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER ONLY FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS. TENURE INDIVIDUAL DRAW-DOWN CAN BE OF VARYING MATURITIES, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM TENOR OF 30 DAYS AND A MAXIMUM TENOR OF 180 DAYS FOR EACH TRANCHE OUT OF THE FACILITY. THE FINAL MATURITY OF ANY TRANCHE SHALL BE WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19,2020 REPAYMENT TERMS PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF EACH TRANCHE IS TO BE REPAID AS BULLET PAYMENT ON THE MATURITY DATE OR IN INSTALLMENTS AS AGREED UPON, BUT WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY BA 5 02027017.V1ICICI BANK 154 RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER DATE: JANUARY 20,2020 REF. PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENT. TENURE 12 MONTHS VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19, 2020 DIVISION WISE LIMIT THE FACILITY IS MADE AVAILABLE FOR THE COMPANY AS A WHOLE, WITHOUT REFERENCE / RESTRICTION TO ANY PARTICULAR DIVISION OF THE COMPANY. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN NON-FUND BASED AND FUND BASED LIMIT REPAYMENT TERMS THE BORROWER SHALL, UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED TO BY THE BANK, REPAY TO THE BANK FORTHWITH ON DEMAND SUCH OF THE AMOUNT AS MAY BE OUTSTANDING OF THE RELEVANT ACCOUNT IN RESPECT OF THE CASH CREDIT FACILITY, TOGETHER WITH ALL INTEREST, COSTS, CHARGES, EXPENSES AND MONIES WHATSOEVER STIPULATED IN, OR PAYABLE UNDER, THE FACILITY AGREEMENT AND/OR THE OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT. PRICING THE RATE OF INTEREST STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK SHALL BE SUM OF 1- ANA 4 12072017.V1I ICICI BANK MCLR-6M AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM OF I- MCLR-6M, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY, ON THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT O THE LOAN REMAINS OUTSTANDING EACH DAY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES MARGIN INVENTORY - UNIFORM MARGIN OF 25% AGAINST ALL COMPONENTS OF INVENTORY . BOOK DEBTS COVER PERIOD: 90 DAYS MARGIN: 25% LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOANS: FACILITY NAME LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOAN (LOCSTL) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC) EXISTING LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC CURRENCY RUPEE FACILITY PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER ONLY FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS. TENURE INDIVIDUAL DRAW-DOWN CAN BE OF VARYING MATURITIES, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM TENOR OF 30 DAYS AND A MAXIMUM TENOR OF 180 DAYS FOR EACH TRANCHE OUT OF THE FACILITY. THE FINAL MATURITY OF ANY TRANCHE SHALL BE WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19,2020 REPAYMENT TERMS PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF EACH TRANCHE IS TO BE REPAID AS BULLET PAYMENT ON THE MATURITY DATE OR IN INSTALLMENTS AS AGREED UPON, BUT WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY BA 5 02027017.V1V ICICI BANK PRICING THE FIXED RATE OF INTEREST FOR EACH DRAWAL OF THE FACILITY WILL BE STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK AT THE TIME OF DISBURSEMENT OF EACH DRAWAL, WHICH SHALL BE SUM OF I-MCLR # AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO MINIMUM OF I-MCLR #, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: 1-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: . DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3-MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY CONDITION CERTIFICATE FROM ITS STATUTORY AUDITOR OR ANY OF ITS KEY MANAGERIAL PRECEDENTS PERSONNEL, DULY AUTHORIZED BY REQUISITE CORPORATE AUTHORIZATIONS, 6 02022017.V1ICICI BANK 154 RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER DATE: JANUARY 20,2020 REF. NO. CAL 1244656752348 WEST COAST PAPER MILLS LIMITED BANGUR NAGAR DANDELI KARNATAKA - 481325 ATTENTION: MR. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. BOOK DEBTS COVER PERIOD: 90 DAYS MARGIN: 25% LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOANS: FACILITY NAME LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOAN (LOCSTL) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC) EXISTING LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC CURRENCY RUPEE FACILITY PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER ONLY FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS. TENURE INDIVIDUAL DRAW-DOWN CAN BE OF VARYING MATURITIES, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM TENOR OF 30 DAYS AND A MAXIMUM TENOR OF 180 DAYS FOR EACH TRANCHE OUT OF THE FACILITY. THE FINAL MATURITY OF ANY TRANCHE SHALL BE WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19,2020 REPAYMENT TERMS PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF EACH TRANCHE IS TO BE REPAID AS BULLET PAYMENT ON THE MATURITY DATE OR IN INSTALLMENTS AS AGREED UPON, BUT WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY BA 5 02027017.V1V ICICI BANK PRICING THE FIXED RATE OF INTEREST FOR EACH DRAWAL OF THE FACILITY WILL BE STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK AT THE TIME OF DISBURSEMENT OF EACH DRAWAL, WHICH SHALL BE SUM OF I-MCLR # AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO MINIMUM OF I-MCLR #, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: 1-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: . DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3-MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY CONDITION CERTIFICATE FROM ITS STATUTORY AUDITOR OR ANY OF ITS KEY MANAGERIAL PRECEDENTS PERSONNEL, DULY AUTHORIZED BY REQUISITE CORPORATE AUTHORIZATIONS, 6 02022017.V1PICICI BANK CONDITION REGARDING THE END USE OF THE FACILITY AND CERTIFYING THAT THE FACILITY SUBSEQUENT HAS BEEN UTILIZED FOR THE PURPOSE, AND NOT DIVERTED OR APPLIED FOR SPECIAL CONDITIONS ANY OTHER PURPOSE WITHIN 30 DAYS FROM THE DISBURSEMENT OF FUNDS "KEY MANAGERIAL PERSONNEL" SHALL HAVE THE MEANING ASSIGNED TO IT IN THE COMPANIES ACT, 2013 DRAWDOWN MINIMUM OF INR 10.0 MILLION PER DRAW DOWN / TRANCHE; DRAW DOWN MATURITY UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE SUBJECT TO A WRITTEN REQUEST / NOTICE OF TWO BUSINESS DAYS IN ADVANCE COMMITMENT FEE NI COOLING PERIOD ONCE THE FACILITY IS FULLY DRAWN, ANY FURTHER TRANCHE/DISBURSEMENT WILL BE ALLOWED ONLY AFTER 1 CLEAR WORKING DAYS FROM THE DATE OFF REPAYMENT OF ANY OF THE OUTSTANDING TRANCHE, SUBJECT TO OVERALL FACILITY LIMIT. IN CASE THE ENTIRE FACILITY IS NOT DRAWN, THE COOLING PERIOD DOES NOT APPLY TO THE EXTENT OF THE UNDRAWN AMOUNT. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN NON-FUND BASED AND FUND BASED LIMIT INTEREST PAYMENT INTEREST WOULD BE PAYABLE MONTHLY, ON THE LAST DATE OF EACH MONTH FREQUENCY INTEREST INTEREST WILL BE CALCULATED ON 365 DAY BASIS IN RESPECT OF RUPEE CALCULATION LOANS EXPORT PACKING CREDIT: FACILITY NAME EXPORT PACKING CREDIT (EPC) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (AS A SUB-LIMIT OF CC) EXISTING LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (AS A SUB-LIMIT OF CC LIMI EPC LIMIT OF INR 250.0 MILLION ON RUNNING ACCOUNT BASIS TENURE EPC LOANS WILL BE ALLOWED UPTO 180 DAYS OR EXPIRY OF CONTRACTS EXPORT LCS OR EXPIRY OF PROCESS CYCLE WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19, 2020 DIVISION WISE THE FACILITY IS MADE AVAILABLE FOR THE COMPANY AS A WHOLE, WITHOUT LIMIT REFERENCE / RESTRICTION TO ANY PARTICULAR DIVISION OF THE COMPANY. PURPOSE THE EPC FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER ONLY FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS. TOTAL NON-FUND BASED 250.00 108.31 OVERALL LIMIT (TOTAL): 536.00 108.31 3 02022017.V1H ICICI BANK FACILITY/IES NOVEMBER 19, 2020 VALID UP TO TERMS AND CONDITIONS CASH CREDIT: FACILITY NAME CASH CREDIT (CC) (MAIN LIMIT) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 286.0 MILLION EXISTING LIMIT INR 286.0 MILLION PEAK LIMIT UNIFORM LIMIT THROUGHOUT THE VALIDITY OF FACILITY SUB LIMIT LINE OF CREDIT SHORT TERM LOAN (LOCSTL): INR 250.0 MILLION (S) 1/DIVISION WISE EXPORT PACKING CREDIT (EPC): INR 250.0 MILLION LIMIT(S)2 FOREIGN USANCE BILL DISCOUNTING (FUBD): INR 250.0 MILLION FOREIGN BILL PURCHASE (FBP): INR 250.0 MILLION PACKING CREDIT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY (PCFC): INR 250.0 MILLION POST SHIPMENT CREDIT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY (PSCFC): INR 250.0 MILLION INLAND CLEAN BILL DISCOUNTING: INR 250.0 MILLION FSCM ONLINE BILL DISCOUNTING: INR 250.0 MILLION THE AGGREGATE OUTSTANDING OF ALL THE SUB-LIMITS AS PROPOSED ABOVE SHALL NOT EXCEED THE OVERALL LIMIT FOR THE FACILITY. PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENT. TENURE 12 MONTHS VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19, 2020 DIVISION WISE LIMIT THE FACILITY IS MADE AVAILABLE FOR THE COMPANY AS A WHOLE, WITHOUT REFERENCE / RESTRICTION TO ANY PARTICULAR DIVISION OF THE COMPANY. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN NON-FUND BASED AND FUND BASED LIMIT REPAYMENT TERMS THE BORROWER SHALL, UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED TO BY THE BANK, REPAY TO THE BANK FORTHWITH ON DEMAND SUCH OF THE AMOUNT AS MAY BE OUTSTANDING OF THE RELEVANT ACCOUNT IN RESPECT OF THE CASH CREDIT FACILITY, TOGETHER WITH ALL INTEREST, COSTS, CHARGES, EXPENSES AND MONIES WHATSOEVER STIPULATED IN, OR PAYABLE UNDER, THE FACILITY AGREEMENT AND/OR THE OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT. PRICING THE RATE OF INTEREST STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK SHALL BE SUM OF 1- ANA 4 12072017.V1I ICICI BANK MCLR-6M AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM OF I- MCLR-6M, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY, ON THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT O THE LOAN REMAINS OUTSTANDING EACH DAY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES MARGIN INVENTORY - UNIFORM MARGIN OF 25% AGAINST ALL COMPONENTS OF INVENTORY . BOOK DEBTS COVER PERIOD: 90 DAYS MARGIN: 25% LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOANS: FACILITY NAME LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOAN (LOCSTL) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC) EXISTING LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC CURRENCY RUPEE FACILITY PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER ONLY FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS. TENURE INDIVIDUAL DRAW-DOWN CAN BE OF VARYING MATURITIES, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM TENOR OF 30 DAYS AND A MAXIMUM TENOR OF 180 DAYS FOR EACH TRANCHE OUT OF THE FACILITY. THE FINAL MATURITY OF ANY TRANCHE SHALL BE WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19,2020 REPAYMENT TERMS PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF EACH TRANCHE IS TO BE REPAID AS BULLET PAYMENT ON THE MATURITY DATE OR IN INSTALLMENTS AS AGREED UPON, BUT WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY BA 5 02027017.V1V ICICI BANK PRICING THE FIXED RATE OF INTEREST FOR EACH DRAWAL OF THE FACILITY WILL BE STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK AT THE TIME OF DISBURSEMENT OF EACH DRAWAL, WHICH SHALL BE SUM OF I-MCLR # AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO MINIMUM OF I-MCLR #, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: 1-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: . DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3-MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY CONDITION CERTIFICATE FROM ITS STATUTORY AUDITOR OR ANY OF ITS KEY MANAGERIAL PRECEDENTS PERSONNEL, DULY AUTHORIZED BY REQUISITE CORPORATE AUTHORIZATIONS, 6 02022017.V1PICICI BANK CONDITION REGARDING THE END USE OF THE FACILITY AND CERTIFYING THAT THE FACILITY SUBSEQUENT HAS BEEN UTILIZED FOR THE PURPOSE, AND NOT DIVERTED OR APPLIED FOR SPECIAL CONDITIONS ANY OTHER PURPOSE WITHIN 30 DAYS FROM THE DISBURSEMENT OF FUNDS "KEY MANAGERIAL PERSONNEL" SHALL HAVE THE MEANING ASSIGNED TO IT IN THE COMPANIES ACT, 2013 DRAWDOWN MINIMUM OF INR 10.0 MILLION PER DRAW DOWN / TRANCHE; DRAW DOWN MATURITY UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE SUBJECT TO A WRITTEN REQUEST / NOTICE OF TWO BUSINESS DAYS IN ADVANCE COMMITMENT FEE NI COOLING PERIOD ONCE THE FACILITY IS FULLY DRAWN, ANY FURTHER TRANCHE/DISBURSEMENT WILL BE ALLOWED ONLY AFTER 1 CLEAR WORKING DAYS FROM THE DATE OFF REPAYMENT OF ANY OF THE OUTSTANDING TRANCHE, SUBJECT TO OVERALL FACILITY LIMIT. IN CASE THE ENTIRE FACILITY IS NOT DRAWN, THE COOLING PERIOD DOES NOT APPLY TO THE EXTENT OF THE UNDRAWN AMOUNT. PURPOSE THE EPC FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER ONLY FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES PEAK LIMIT UNIFORM LIMIT OF INR 250.0 MILLION (BEING WITHIN THE OVERALL LIMITS) THROUGHOUT THE VALIDITY OF THE EPC FACILITY. 00 2022017.V1W ICICI BANK EXPORT ORDER 90% OF THE FOB VALUE IN RESPECT OF EXPORT ORDERS EXPORT LC 90% OF THE FOB VALUE IN RESPECT OF IRREVOCABLE LCS ISSUED BY A BANK ACCEPTABLE TO THE BANK. ECGC COVER ECGC COVER IS WAIVED. DOCUMENTS IRREVOCABLE LCS/ EXPORT ORDERS/ TRACK RECORD WITH SUBMISSION OF AGAINST WHICH PROOF OF EXPORT ORDER EPC TO BE GIVEN OTHER TERMS . EXPORT FINANCE IS SUBJECT TO RBI GUIDELINES ISSUED FROM TIME-TO- TIME . IN CASE THE EPC IS NOT LIQUIDATED IN A MANNER APPROVED BY RBI, THE BORROWER SHALL PAY INTEREST AT THE RATE OF CLEAN CASH CREDIT RATE. BANK WILL MARK OFF INDIVIDUAL EXPORT BILLS AS AND WHEN THEY ARE RECEIVED FOR NEGOTIATION/ COLLECTION ON 'FIRST IN FIRST OUT' (FIFO) OASIS. RUNNING ACCOUNT FACILITY WILL NOT BE GRANTED TO SUB-SUPPLIERS. DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: O THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY IE., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDING UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; O OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. . BANKS MAY EXTEND THE 'RUNNING ACCOUNT' FACILITY ONLY TO THOSE EXPORTERS WHOSE TRACK RECORD HAS BEEN GOOD AS ALSO EXPORT ORIENTED UNITS (EOUS) / UNITS IN FREE TRADE ZONES / EXPORT PROCESSING ZONES (EPZS) AND SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONES (SEZS); ALL APPROVALS ARE TRANSACTION SPECIFIC. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENT. TENURE 12 MONTHS VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19, 2020 DIVISION WISE LIMIT THE FACILITY IS MADE AVAILABLE FOR THE COMPANY AS A WHOLE, WITHOUT REFERENCE / RESTRICTION TO ANY PARTICULAR DIVISION OF THE COMPANY. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN NON-FUND BASED AND FUND BASED LIMIT REPAYMENT TERMS THE BORROWER SHALL, UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED TO BY THE BANK, REPAY TO THE BANK FORTHWITH ON DEMAND SUCH OF THE AMOUNT AS MAY BE OUTSTANDING OF THE RELEVANT ACCOUNT IN RESPECT OF THE CASH CREDIT FACILITY, TOGETHER WITH ALL INTEREST, COSTS, CHARGES, EXPENSES AND MONIES WHATSOEVER STIPULATED IN, OR PAYABLE UNDER, THE FACILITY AGREEMENT AND/OR THE OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT. PRICING THE RATE OF INTEREST STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK SHALL BE SUM OF 1- ANA 4 12072017.V1I ICICI BANK MCLR-6M AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM OF I- MCLR-6M, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY, ON THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT O THE LOAN REMAINS OUTSTANDING EACH DAY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. BOOK DEBTS COVER PERIOD: 90 DAYS MARGIN: 25% LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOANS: FACILITY NAME LINE OF CREDIT FOR SHORT TERM LOAN (LOCSTL) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC) EXISTING LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (SUBLIMIT OF CC CURRENCY RUPEE FACILITY PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER ONLY FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS. TENURE INDIVIDUAL DRAW-DOWN CAN BE OF VARYING MATURITIES, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM TENOR OF 30 DAYS AND A MAXIMUM TENOR OF 180 DAYS FOR EACH TRANCHE OUT OF THE FACILITY. THE FINAL MATURITY OF ANY TRANCHE SHALL BE WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19,2020 REPAYMENT TERMS PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF EACH TRANCHE IS TO BE REPAID AS BULLET PAYMENT ON THE MATURITY DATE OR IN INSTALLMENTS AS AGREED UPON, BUT WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY BA 5 02027017.V1V ICICI BANK PRICING THE FIXED RATE OF INTEREST FOR EACH DRAWAL OF THE FACILITY WILL BE STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK AT THE TIME OF DISBURSEMENT OF EACH DRAWAL, WHICH SHALL BE SUM OF I-MCLR # AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO MINIMUM OF I-MCLR #, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: 1-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: . DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3-MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. IN CASE THE ENTIRE FACILITY IS NOT DRAWN, THE COOLING PERIOD DOES NOT APPLY TO THE EXTENT OF THE UNDRAWN AMOUNT. EXPORT FINANCE IS SUBJECT TO RBI GUIDELINES ISSUED FROM TIME-TO- TIME . IN CASE THE EPC IS NOT LIQUIDATED IN A MANNER APPROVED BY RBI, THE BORROWER SHALL PAY INTEREST AT THE RATE OF CLEAN CASH CREDIT RATE. BANK WILL MARK OFF INDIVIDUAL EXPORT BILLS AS AND WHEN THEY ARE RECEIVED FOR NEGOTIATION/ COLLECTION ON 'FIRST IN FIRST OUT' (FIFO) OASIS. RUNNING ACCOUNT FACILITY WILL NOT BE GRANTED TO SUB-SUPPLIERS. DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: O THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY IE., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDING UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; O OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. . DOCUMENTS IRREVOCABLE LCS / EXPORT ORDERS / TRACK RECORD WITH SUBMISSION OF AGAINST WHICH PROOF OF EXPORT ORDER EPC TO BE GIVEN OTHER TERMS EXPORT FINANCE IS SUBJECT TO RBI GUIDELINES ISSUED FROM TIME-TO- TIME . IN CASE THE EPC IS NOT LIQUIDATED IN A MANNER APPROVED BY RBI, THE BORROWER SHALL PAY INTEREST AT THE RATE OF CLEAN CASH CREDIT RATE. BANK WILL MARK OFF INDIVIDUAL EXPORT BILLS AS AND WHEN THEY ARE RECEIVED FOR NEGOTIATION/ COLLECTION ON 'FIRST IN FIRST OUT' (FIFO) BASIS. RUNNING ACCOUNT FACILITY WILL NOT BE GRANTED TO SUB-SUPPLIERS. . DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: O THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY I.E., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDINGS UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; O OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. . BANKS MAY EXTEND THE "RUNNING ACCOUNT' FACILITY ONLY TO THOSE EXPORTERS WHOSE TRACK RECORD HAS BEEN GOOD AS ALSO EXPORT ORIENTED UNITS (EOUS) / UNITS IN FREE TRADE ZONES / EXPORT PROCESSING ZONES (EPZS) AND SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONES (SEZS); . ALL APPROVALS ARE TRANSACTION SPECIFIC. . DIRECT DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY EXPORTERS WITH OVERSEAS BANKS AND / OR ANY AGENCY WILL BE DONE ONLY THROUGH THE BRANCH OF ICICI BANK DESIGNATED FOR THIS PURPOSE. DISBURSEMENT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WOULD BE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY OF FOREX. . IF ANY PCFC / EPC HAS BEEN AVAILED AGAINST THE SAME UNDERLYING DOCUMENT, THEN THE SAME OUTSTANDING WILL BE ADJUSTED FROM THE PROCEEDS OF PSCFC. ALL FACILITIES IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WILL BE GOVERNED BY RBI / FEMA 11 32022017.V1ICICI BANK 154 RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER DATE: JANUARY 20,2020 REF. NO. CAL 1244656752348 WEST COAST PAPER MILLS LIMITED BANGUR NAGAR DANDELI KARNATAKA - 481325 ATTENTION: MR. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. TENURE INDIVIDUAL DRAW-DOWN CAN BE OF VARYING MATURITIES, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM TENOR OF 30 DAYS AND A MAXIMUM TENOR OF 180 DAYS FOR EACH TRANCHE OUT OF THE FACILITY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: 1-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: . DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3-MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: 1-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. PURPOSE THE FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENT. TENURE 12 MONTHS VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19, 2020 DIVISION WISE LIMIT THE FACILITY IS MADE AVAILABLE FOR THE COMPANY AS A WHOLE, WITHOUT REFERENCE / RESTRICTION TO ANY PARTICULAR DIVISION OF THE COMPANY. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN NON-FUND BASED AND FUND BASED LIMIT REPAYMENT TERMS THE BORROWER SHALL, UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED TO BY THE BANK, REPAY TO THE BANK FORTHWITH ON DEMAND SUCH OF THE AMOUNT AS MAY BE OUTSTANDING OF THE RELEVANT ACCOUNT IN RESPECT OF THE CASH CREDIT FACILITY, TOGETHER WITH ALL INTEREST, COSTS, CHARGES, EXPENSES AND MONIES WHATSOEVER STIPULATED IN, OR PAYABLE UNDER, THE FACILITY AGREEMENT AND/OR THE OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT. PRICING THE RATE OF INTEREST STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK SHALL BE SUM OF 1- ANA 4 12072017.V1I ICICI BANK MCLR-6M AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM OF I- MCLR-6M, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY, ON THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT O THE LOAN REMAINS OUTSTANDING EACH DAY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. IF ANY PCFC / EPC HAS BEEN AVAILED AGAINST THE SAME UNDERLYING DOCUMENT, THEN THE SAME OUTSTANDING WILL BE ADJUSTED FROM THE PROCEEDS OF PSCFC. OVER THE DOCUMENT RATE. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. ANY OTHER CONDITION AS MAY BE APPLICABLE AS PER EXISTING WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES AND SPECIFIED BY ICICI BANK PURCHASER/S PURCHASER/S OF GOODS AND SERVICES FROM THE BORROWER; THE EXPRESSION "PURCHASER/S" INCLUDES, UNLESS IT BE REPUGNANT TO THE SUBJECT OR CONTEXT THEREOF, ITS SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. DISBURSEMENT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WOULD BE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY OF FOREX. . IF ANY PCFC / EPC HAS BEEN AVAILED AGAINST THE SAME UNDERLYING DOCUMENT, THEN THE SAME OUTSTANDING WILL BE ADJUSTED FROM THE PROCEEDS OF PSCFC. ALL FACILITIES IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WILL BE GOVERNED BY RBI / FEMA 11 32022017.V1P ICICI BANK GUIDELINES. THE FACILITY WILL BE DISBURSED EITHER BY WAY OF NEGOTIATION / DISCOUNTING OF BILLS UNDER EXPORT LETTER OF CREDITS ISSUED TO BSL OR PURCHASE OF BILLS (LC / NON-LC) UNDER THIS SANCTIONED LIMIT. BILLS DRAWN ON WOS / JVS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO 50% OF FBP / FUBD LIMITS. IF FELT NECESSARY, PURCHASE / DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY THE BANK WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE EXTENT OF CREDIT LIMIT SANCTIONED BY ECGC ON THE OVERSEAS BUYERS INDIVIDUALLY. IF FELT NECESSARY, DISCOUNTING / PURCHASE OF EXPORT BILLS WILL BE SUBJECTED TO AVAILABILITY OF "SATISFACTORY" OPINION REPORTS FROM BANKS / AGENCIES OVERSEAS. DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6 MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. - LINE * 13 02022017.V1V ICICI BANK OVERDUE INTEREST: 2.00% P.A. OVER THE DOCUMENT RATE. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. EXPORT FINANCE IS SUBJECT TO RBI GUIDELINES ISSUED FROM TIME-TO- TIME . IN CASE THE EPC IS NOT LIQUIDATED IN A MANNER APPROVED BY RBI, THE BORROWER SHALL PAY INTEREST AT THE RATE OF CLEAN CASH CREDIT RATE. BANK WILL MARK OFF INDIVIDUAL EXPORT BILLS AS AND WHEN THEY ARE RECEIVED FOR NEGOTIATION/ COLLECTION ON 'FIRST IN FIRST OUT' (FIFO) OASIS. RUNNING ACCOUNT FACILITY WILL NOT BE GRANTED TO SUB-SUPPLIERS. DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: O THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY IE., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDING UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; O OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. . BANKS MAY EXTEND THE 'RUNNING ACCOUNT' FACILITY ONLY TO THOSE EXPORTERS WHOSE TRACK RECORD HAS BEEN GOOD AS ALSO EXPORT ORIENTED UNITS (EOUS) / UNITS IN FREE TRADE ZONES / EXPORT PROCESSING ZONES (EPZS) AND SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONES (SEZS); ALL APPROVALS ARE TRANSACTION SPECIFIC. LIMIT PCFC LIMIT ON RUNNING ACCOUNT BASIS. PURPOSE THE PCFC FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER ONLY FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS. TENURE PCFC LOANS WILL BE ALLOWED UPTO 180 DAYS OR EXPIRY OF CONTRACTS / EXPORT LCS OR EXPIRY OF PROCESS CYCLE WHICHEVER IS EARLIER. DIVISION WISE | THE FACILITY IS MADE AVAILABLE FOR THE COMPANY AS A WHOLE, WITHOUT LIMIT REFERENCE / RESTRICTION TO ANY PARTICULAR DIVISION OF THE COMPANY. VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19,2020 REPAYMENT TERMS PCFC MAY BE LIQUIDATED OUT OF PROCEEDS OF EXPORT BILL DISCOUNTING / PURCHASE OR BY WAY OF RUPEE ADVANCE FACILITY AGAINST EXPORT BILL THE EPC SHALL BE LIQUIDATED OUT OF PROCEEDS OF EXPORT BILL DISCOUNTING / PURCHASE. PRICING THE RATE OF INTEREST FOR EACH DRAWAL OF THE FACILITY WILL BE STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK AT THE TIME OF DISBURSEMENT OF EACH DRAWAL ON THE BASIS OF THE REPAYMENT SCHEDULE FOR THAT DRAWAL PLUS APPLICABLE INTEREST TAX OR OTHER STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY. DOCUMENTS IRREVOCABLE LCS / EXPORT ORDERS / TRACK RECORD WITH SUBMISSION OF AGAINST WHICH PROOF OF EXPORT ORDER EPC TO BE GIVEN OTHER TERMS EXPORT FINANCE IS SUBJECT TO RBI GUIDELINES ISSUED FROM TIME-TO- TIME . IN CASE THE EPC IS NOT LIQUIDATED IN A MANNER APPROVED BY RBI, THE BORROWER SHALL PAY INTEREST AT THE RATE OF CLEAN CASH CREDIT RATE. BANK WILL MARK OFF INDIVIDUAL EXPORT BILLS AS AND WHEN THEY ARE RECEIVED FOR NEGOTIATION/ COLLECTION ON 'FIRST IN FIRST OUT' (FIFO) BASIS. RUNNING ACCOUNT FACILITY WILL NOT BE GRANTED TO SUB-SUPPLIERS. . DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: O THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY I.E., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDINGS UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; O OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. . BANKS MAY EXTEND THE "RUNNING ACCOUNT' FACILITY ONLY TO THOSE EXPORTERS WHOSE TRACK RECORD HAS BEEN GOOD AS ALSO EXPORT ORIENTED UNITS (EOUS) / UNITS IN FREE TRADE ZONES / EXPORT PROCESSING ZONES (EPZS) AND SPECIAL ECONOMIC ZONES (SEZS); . ALL APPROVALS ARE TRANSACTION SPECIFIC. . DIRECT DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY EXPORTERS WITH OVERSEAS BANKS AND / OR ANY AGENCY WILL BE DONE ONLY THROUGH THE BRANCH OF ICICI BANK DESIGNATED FOR THIS PURPOSE. DISBURSEMENT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WOULD BE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY OF FOREX. . IF ANY PCFC / EPC HAS BEEN AVAILED AGAINST THE SAME UNDERLYING DOCUMENT, THEN THE SAME OUTSTANDING WILL BE ADJUSTED FROM THE PROCEEDS OF PSCFC. ALL FACILITIES IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WILL BE GOVERNED BY RBI / FEMA 11 32022017.V1P ICICI BANK GUIDELINES. THE FACILITY WILL BE DISBURSED EITHER BY WAY OF NEGOTIATION / DISCOUNTING OF BILLS UNDER EXPORT LETTER OF CREDITS ISSUED TO BSL OR PURCHASE OF BILLS (LC / NON-LC) UNDER THIS SANCTIONED LIMIT. PENAL RATE OF INTEREST: BEFORE DELINKING / CRYSTALLIZATION OF BILL (SINGAPORE: ON 4TH DAY AFTER DUE DATE; BAHRAIN: ON 31ST DAY AFTER DUE DATE): USD PRIME RATE + 2% AFTER DELINKING / CRYSTALLIZATION OF BILL: FROM 4TH DAY FOR SINGAPORE EBRD AND 31ST DAY FOR BAHRAIN EBRD: 12.25% MARGIN INVENTORY UNIFORM MARGIN OF 25% AGAINST ALL COMPONENTS OF INVENTORY BOOK DEBT: COVER PERIOD: 90 DAYS MARGIN : 10% INTERCHANGEABILITY | FULL TWO-WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN PCFC AND EPC/PSCFC/FUBD/FBP TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY FROM FUND BASED TO NON-FUND BASED SPECIFIC SECURITY AGAINST DOCUMENTS OF TITLE TO GOODS VIZ., BILLS OF LADING / AWBS, BILLS OF EXCHANGE, INVOICES, PACKING LISTS, CERTIFICATES OF ORIGIN ETC. GENERAL (IF COMPANY WILL OBTAIN ECGC'S SHIPMENTS (COMPREHENSIVE RISKS) APPLICABLE) POLICY FOR POST - SHIPMENT CREDIT AT ITS EXPENSE. BILLS DRAWN ON WOS / JVS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO 50% OF FBP / FUBD LIMITS. IF FELT NECESSARY, PURCHASE / DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY THE BANK WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE EXTENT OF CREDIT LIMIT SANCTIONED BY ECGC ON THE OVERSEAS BUYERS INDIVIDUALLY. IF FELT NECESSARY, DISCOUNTING / PURCHASE OF EXPORT BILLS WILL BE SUBJECTED TO AVAILABILITY OF "SATISFACTORY" OPINION REPORTS FROM BANKS / AGENCIES OVERSEAS. INLAND BILLS PURCHASED / DISCOUNTED: FACILITY NAME FSCM - ONLINE INLAND CLEAN BILL DISCOUNTING (BOTH SALES AND PURCHASE) THIS FACILITY IS AVAILABLE ONLINE TO THE BORROWER THROUGH CORPORATE INTERNET BANKING UNDER FINANCIAL SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT (FSCM) MODULE ALONE OR THROUGH FSCM AND HOST TO HOST MODULE ("H2H") JOINTLY. ACCESS TO FSCM AND H2H (IF REQUIRED) SHALL BE MADE 12 2022017.VQ ICICI BANK AVAILABLE AFTER EXECUTION OF APPROPRIATE DOCUMENTS BY THE BORROWER. PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION (AS SUBLIMIT OF CC LIMIT) TENURE MAXIMUM 180 DAYS (FROM INVOICE / BILL OF EXCHANGE / DISPATCH DATE) VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19, 2020 PRICING THE FIXED RATE OF INTEREST FOR EACH DRAWAL OF THE FACILITY WILL BE STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK AT THE TIME OF DISBURSEMENT OF EACH DRAWAL, WHICH SHALL BE SUM OF I-MCLR # AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO MINIMUM OF I-MCLR #, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: I-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6 MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. - LINE * 13 02022017.V1V ICICI BANK OVERDUE INTEREST: 2.00% P.A. OVER THE DOCUMENT RATE. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. TENURE INDIVIDUAL DRAW-DOWN CAN BE OF VARYING MATURITIES, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM TENOR OF 30 DAYS AND A MAXIMUM TENOR OF 180 DAYS FOR EACH TRANCHE OUT OF THE FACILITY. THE FINAL MATURITY OF ANY TRANCHE SHALL BE WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19,2020 REPAYMENT TERMS PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF EACH TRANCHE IS TO BE REPAID AS BULLET PAYMENT ON THE MATURITY DATE OR IN INSTALLMENTS AS AGREED UPON, BUT WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY BA 5 02027017.V1V ICICI BANK PRICING THE FIXED RATE OF INTEREST FOR EACH DRAWAL OF THE FACILITY WILL BE STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK AT THE TIME OF DISBURSEMENT OF EACH DRAWAL, WHICH SHALL BE SUM OF I-MCLR # AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO MINIMUM OF I-MCLR #, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: 1-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: . DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3-MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY CONDITION CERTIFICATE FROM ITS STATUTORY AUDITOR OR ANY OF ITS KEY MANAGERIAL PRECEDENTS PERSONNEL, DULY AUTHORIZED BY REQUISITE CORPORATE AUTHORIZATIONS, 6 02022017.V1PICICI BANK CONDITION REGARDING THE END USE OF THE FACILITY AND CERTIFYING THAT THE FACILITY SUBSEQUENT HAS BEEN UTILIZED FOR THE PURPOSE, AND NOT DIVERTED OR APPLIED FOR SPECIAL CONDITIONS ANY OTHER PURPOSE WITHIN 30 DAYS FROM THE DISBURSEMENT OF FUNDS "KEY MANAGERIAL PERSONNEL" SHALL HAVE THE MEANING ASSIGNED TO IT IN THE COMPANIES ACT, 2013 DRAWDOWN MINIMUM OF INR 10.0 MILLION PER DRAW DOWN / TRANCHE; DRAW DOWN MATURITY UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE SUBJECT TO A WRITTEN REQUEST / NOTICE OF TWO BUSINESS DAYS IN ADVANCE COMMITMENT FEE NI COOLING PERIOD ONCE THE FACILITY IS FULLY DRAWN, ANY FURTHER TRANCHE/DISBURSEMENT WILL BE ALLOWED ONLY AFTER 1 CLEAR WORKING DAYS FROM THE DATE OFF REPAYMENT OF ANY OF THE OUTSTANDING TRANCHE, SUBJECT TO OVERALL FACILITY LIMIT. IN CASE THE ENTIRE FACILITY IS NOT DRAWN, THE COOLING PERIOD DOES NOT APPLY TO THE EXTENT OF THE UNDRAWN AMOUNT. PURPOSE THE EPC FACILITY SHALL BE UTILIZED BY THE BORROWER ONLY FOR MEETING ITS WORKING CAPITAL REQUIREMENTS. ECGC COVER ECGC COVER IS WAIVED. DOCUMENTS IRREVOCABLE LCS/ EXPORT ORDERS/ TRACK RECORD WITH SUBMISSION OF AGAINST WHICH PROOF OF EXPORT ORDER EPC TO BE GIVEN OTHER TERMS . EXPORT FINANCE IS SUBJECT TO RBI GUIDELINES ISSUED FROM TIME-TO- TIME . IN CASE THE EPC IS NOT LIQUIDATED IN A MANNER APPROVED BY RBI, THE BORROWER SHALL PAY INTEREST AT THE RATE OF CLEAN CASH CREDIT RATE. BANK WILL MARK OFF INDIVIDUAL EXPORT BILLS AS AND WHEN THEY ARE RECEIVED FOR NEGOTIATION/ COLLECTION ON 'FIRST IN FIRST OUT' (FIFO) OASIS. RUNNING ACCOUNT FACILITY WILL NOT BE GRANTED TO SUB-SUPPLIERS. DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: O THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY IE., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDING UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; O OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. . DIRECT DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY EXPORTERS WITH OVERSEAS BANKS AND / OR ANY AGENCY WILL BE DONE ONLY THROUGH THE BRANCH OF ICICI BANK DESIGNATED FOR THIS PURPOSE. DISBURSEMENT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WOULD BE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY OF FOREX. . IF ANY PCFC / EPC HAS BEEN AVAILED AGAINST THE SAME UNDERLYING DOCUMENT, THEN THE SAME OUTSTANDING WILL BE ADJUSTED FROM THE PROCEEDS OF PSCFC. ALL FACILITIES IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WILL BE GOVERNED BY RBI / FEMA 11 32022017.V1P ICICI BANK GUIDELINES. THE FACILITY WILL BE DISBURSED EITHER BY WAY OF NEGOTIATION / DISCOUNTING OF BILLS UNDER EXPORT LETTER OF CREDITS ISSUED TO BSL OR PURCHASE OF BILLS (LC / NON-LC) UNDER THIS SANCTIONED LIMIT. PENAL RATE OF INTEREST: BEFORE DELINKING / CRYSTALLIZATION OF BILL (SINGAPORE: ON 4TH DAY AFTER DUE DATE; BAHRAIN: ON 31ST DAY AFTER DUE DATE): USD PRIME RATE + 2% AFTER DELINKING / CRYSTALLIZATION OF BILL: FROM 4TH DAY FOR SINGAPORE EBRD AND 31ST DAY FOR BAHRAIN EBRD: 12.25% MARGIN INVENTORY UNIFORM MARGIN OF 25% AGAINST ALL COMPONENTS OF INVENTORY BOOK DEBT: COVER PERIOD: 90 DAYS MARGIN : 10% INTERCHANGEABILITY | FULL TWO-WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN PCFC AND EPC/PSCFC/FUBD/FBP TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY FROM FUND BASED TO NON-FUND BASED SPECIFIC SECURITY AGAINST DOCUMENTS OF TITLE TO GOODS VIZ., BILLS OF LADING / AWBS, BILLS OF EXCHANGE, INVOICES, PACKING LISTS, CERTIFICATES OF ORIGIN ETC. BILLS DRAWN ON WOS / JVS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO 50% OF FBP / FUBD LIMITS. IF FELT NECESSARY, PURCHASE / DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY THE BANK WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE EXTENT OF CREDIT LIMIT SANCTIONED BY ECGC ON THE OVERSEAS BUYERS INDIVIDUALLY. IF FELT NECESSARY, DISCOUNTING / PURCHASE OF EXPORT BILLS WILL BE SUBJECTED TO AVAILABILITY OF "SATISFACTORY" OPINION REPORTS FROM BANKS / AGENCIES OVERSEAS. INLAND BILLS PURCHASED / DISCOUNTED: FACILITY NAME FSCM - ONLINE INLAND CLEAN BILL DISCOUNTING (BOTH SALES AND PURCHASE) THIS FACILITY IS AVAILABLE ONLINE TO THE BORROWER THROUGH CORPORATE INTERNET BANKING UNDER FINANCIAL SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT (FSCM) MODULE ALONE OR THROUGH FSCM AND HOST TO HOST MODULE ("H2H") JOINTLY. OVER THE DOCUMENT RATE. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. ANY OTHER CONDITION AS MAY BE APPLICABLE AS PER EXISTING WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES AND SPECIFIED BY ICICI BANK PURCHASER/S PURCHASER/S OF GOODS AND SERVICES FROM THE BORROWER; THE EXPRESSION "PURCHASER/S" INCLUDES, UNLESS IT BE REPUGNANT TO THE SUBJECT OR CONTEXT THEREOF, ITS SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS. THIS FACILITY SHALL BE PROVIDED TO THE BORROWER ONLY FOR THE GOODS AND SERVICES SOLD TO THE PURCHASER/S. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL INTERCHANGEABILITY WITH C CFACILITY. FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN FUND BASED AND NON-FUND BASED LIMITS. THE BORROWER WILL BE PAID THE PROCEEDS OF THE FACILITY BY WAY OF DIRECT CREDIT/ FUND TRANSFER TO BORROWER'S BANK ACCOUNT MAINTAINED WITH ICICI BANK AS SPECIFIED IN THE FSCM APPLICATION FORM. ON DUE DATE, THE BORROWER SHALL PAY THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT OF THE FACILITY TO ICICI BANK. BILLS WILL BE DRAWN ON GOVERNMENT DEPARTMENTS, CORPORATIONS, REPUTED PUBLIC AND PRIVATE SECTOR UNDERTAKINGS. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY.
