BILLS DRAWN ON WOS / JVS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO 50% OF FBP / FUBD LIMITS. IF FELT NECESSARY, PURCHASE / DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY THE BANK WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE EXTENT OF CREDIT LIMIT SANCTIONED BY ECGC ON THE OVERSEAS BUYERS INDIVIDUALLY. IF FELT NECESSARY, DISCOUNTING / PURCHASE OF EXPORT BILLS WILL BE SUBJECTED TO AVAILABILITY OF "SATISFACTORY" OPINION REPORTS FROM BANKS / AGENCIES OVERSEAS. INLAND BILLS PURCHASED / DISCOUNTED: FACILITY NAME FSCM - ONLINE INLAND CLEAN BILL DISCOUNTING (BOTH SALES AND PURCHASE) THIS FACILITY IS AVAILABLE ONLINE TO THE BORROWER THROUGH CORPORATE INTERNET BANKING UNDER FINANCIAL SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT (FSCM) MODULE ALONE OR THROUGH FSCM AND HOST TO HOST MODULE ("H2H") JOINTLY. OVER THE DOCUMENT RATE. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. ANY OTHER CONDITION AS MAY BE APPLICABLE AS PER EXISTING WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES AND SPECIFIED BY ICICI BANK PURCHASER/S PURCHASER/S OF GOODS AND SERVICES FROM THE BORROWER; THE EXPRESSION "PURCHASER/S" INCLUDES, UNLESS IT BE REPUGNANT TO THE SUBJECT OR CONTEXT THEREOF, ITS SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS. THIS FACILITY SHALL BE PROVIDED TO THE BORROWER ONLY FOR THE GOODS AND SERVICES SOLD TO THE PURCHASER/S. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL INTERCHANGEABILITY WITH C CFACILITY. FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN FUND BASED AND NON-FUND BASED LIMITS. THE BORROWER WILL BE PAID THE PROCEEDS OF THE FACILITY BY WAY OF DIRECT CREDIT/ FUND TRANSFER TO BORROWER'S BANK ACCOUNT MAINTAINED WITH ICICI BANK AS SPECIFIED IN THE FSCM APPLICATION FORM. ON DUE DATE, THE BORROWER SHALL PAY THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT OF THE FACILITY TO ICICI BANK. SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES: FIRST PARI PASSU CHARGE WITH CONSORTIUM BANKERS BY WAY OF HYPOTHECATION IN FAVOUR OF THE BANK ON THE BORROWER'S ENTIRE STOCKS OF RAW MATERIALS, WORK-IN-PROCESS, SEMI-FINISHED AND FINISHED GOODS, CONSUMABLE STORES AND SPARES AND SUCH OTHER MOVABLES INCLUDING BOOK DEBTS, BILLS, WHETHER DOCUMENTARY OR CLEAN, BOTH PRESENT AND FUTURE. SPECIAL TERMS: SR. PARTICULARS SPECIAL TERM/CONDITION NO 1. OFAC - A) THE BORROWER HEREBY REPRESENTS AND WARRANTS THAT: NEITHER THE BORROWER NOR ANY OTHER PERSON BENEFITING IN ANY CAPACITY IN CONNECTION WITH OR FROM THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT AND/OR ANY INSTRUMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS THEREUNDER IS A SPECIALLY DESIGNATED NATIONAL (SDN) AND/OR OTHERWISE SANCTIONED, UNDER THE SANCTIONS PROMULGATED BY THE UNITED STATES (INCLUDING ITS OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL'S (OFAC))), INDIA, UNITED STATES, UNITED NATIONS, EUROPEAN UNION, THE JURISDICTION OF THE FACILITY OFFICE AND/OR ANY OTHER COUNTRY (COLLECTIVELY, THE "SANCTIONS"). B) THE BORROWER HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGES, COVENANTS AND AGREES THAT: I. THE SANCTIONS MAY BECOME APPLICABLE WITH RESPECT TO THE SAID FACILITIES AND/OR TRANSACTIONS THEREUNDER, 27 2022017.V1W ICICI BANK INCLUDING TO ANY DOCUMENTARY CREDITS AND/OR GUARANTEES ISSUED AND/OR DISBURSEMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS MADE BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT. SANCTIONS MAY PERTAIN INTER ALIA, TO THE PURPOSE AND/OR END USE OF THE SAID FACILITIES, GOODS MANUFACTURED IN OR ORIGINATED FROM/THROUGH CERTAIN COUNTRIES, SHIPMENT FROM/TO/USING CERTAIN COUNTRIES, PORTS, VESSELS, LINERS AND/OR DUE TO INVOLVEMENT OF CERTAIN PERSONS AND ENTITIES (INCLUDING CORRESPONDENT BANKS AND THE FACILITY OFFICE). CONSEQUENTLY, DISBURSEMENT, ISSUANCE, PAYMENT AND/OR PROCESSING UNDER THE SAID FACILITIES BY ICICI BANK MAY BECOME SUBJECTED TO THE SANCTIONS AND ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO REFUSE TO PROCESS ANY TRANSACTIONS THAT VIOLATE/MAY VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS. II. IT SHALL ENSURE THAT THE TRANSACTIONS ENTERED INTO PURSUANT TO THE SANCTION LETTER/ CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT DO NOT VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS AND THAT NO PERSONS, ENTITIES OR OTHERWISE, CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS ARE INVOLVED IN ANY TRANSACTIONS HEREUNDER. THE BORROWER AGREES THAT IT SHALL NOT AVAIL OF THE SAID FACILITIES OR USE THE PROCEEDS OF THE SAID FACILITIES IN ANY TRANSACTION WITH, OR FOR THE PURPOSE OF FINANCING THE ACTIVITIES OF, ANY PERSON CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS AS AFORESAID. IIT IT SHALL INDEMNIFY AND HOLD HARMLESS ICICI BANK, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, FOR ALL LOSSES AND LIABILITIES (INCLUDING DUE TO CLAIMS BY A THIRD PARTY), INCURRED BY ICICI BANK AS A RESULT OF ANY BREACH BY IT OF ITS REPRESENTATIONS AND UNDERTAKINGS CONTAINED HEREIN PERTAINING TO THE SANCTIONS AND/OR DUE TO ANY ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE SANCTIONS. NO ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT, INCLUDING GRANT OF THE SAID FACILITIES, ISSUANCE OF ANY FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS THERE UNDER OR PROCESSING OF ANY B. CIC! 28 02022017.V1G ICICI BANK PAYMENTS OR TRANSACTIONS, NOR ANY ACTION TAKEN BY THE BORROWER IN RELATION THERETO, SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE A WAIVER OF ANY OF ICICI BANK'S RIGHTS UNDER ANY PROVISIONS OF THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY CICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT RELATED TO THE SANCTIONS NOR SHALL THEY ACT TO RELIEVE THE BORROWER OF ITS OBLIGATIONS OR LIABILITIES IN RELATION THERETO. THE BORROWER HEREBY AGREES AND CONFIRMS THAT ANY BREACH OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS STIPULATED HEREIN ABOVE SHALL CONSTITUTE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK. 2 . HEDGING CLAUSE THE BORROWER REPRESENTS THAT IT HAS ADOPTED A SUITABLE HEDGING POLICY, APPROVED BY ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS PARTNERS/ PROPRIETOR/ TRUSTEE/ MEMBERS, WHICH INCLUDES MECHANISMS TO REDUCE ITS CURRENCY MISMATCHES. THE BORROWER'S HEDGING POLICY SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND UPDATED FROM TIME TO TIME, TILL ALL THE MONIES DUE AND PAYABLE UNDER THE FACILITY AGREEMENT/ TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS ARE FULLY PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF THE BANK/ LENDER. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE ALL INFORMATION AS MAY BE REQUIRED BY THE BANK/ LENDER ON A QUARTERLY BASIS OR FROM TIME TO TIME IN RELATION TO ITS FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURES AND HEDGING DETAILS IN RELATION THERETO. IN THE EVENT OF ANY CHANGE IN APPLICABLE LAWS/ REGULATIONS (INCLUDING REGULATORY/STATUTORY REQUIREMENTS PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE), THE BANK/ LENDER SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO RECOVER THE COST, IN ANY MANNER THAT IT DEEMS FIT, INCLUDING BY WAY OF REVISION IN SPREAD/APPLICABLE RATE. IF THE BORROWER HAS UNHEDGED FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURE, THEN THE BANK WILL RESERVE A RIGHT TO INCREASE THE PRICING. 3. UNCONDITIONAL NOTWITHSTANDING ANYTHING CONTAINED IN THE TRANSACTION CANCELLATION CLAUSE DOCUMENTS, THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO CANCEL THE UNUTILIZED PORTION OF THE FACILITY, IN WHOLE OR IN PART, AT ANY TIME DURING THE SUBSISTENCE OF THE FACILITY, WITHOUT GIVING ANY PRIOR NOTICE TO THE BORROWER, FOR ANY REASON WHATSOEVER, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, ON THE OCCURRENCE OF DETERIORATION OF CREDITWORTHINESS OF THE ICICI BA 29 02022017.V1WICICI BANK BORROWER, OR FOR NONCOMPLIANCE OF ANY TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS. FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE, 'DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS' SHALL INCLUDE WITHOUT LIMITATION; THE FOLLOWING EVENTS: (I) DOWNGRADE THE RATING OF THE BORROWER BY A CREDIT RATING AGENCY; (II INCLUSION OF THE BORROWER AND/OR ANY OF ITS DIRECTORS IN THE RBI'S WILLFUL DEFAULTERS LIST; (III) CLOSURE OF A SIGNIFICANT PORTION OF THE BORROWER'S OPERATING CAPACITY; (IV) DECLINE IN THE PROFIT AFTER TAX OF THE BORROWER BY MORE THAN FIFTEEN PERCENT; ( V ) ANY ADVERSE COMMENT FROM AN AUDITOR; AND (VI) ANY OTHER REASON/EVENT IN THE OPINION OF THE BANK, CONSTITUTING OR WHICH MAY CONSTITUTE, DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS THE BORROWER UNCONDITIONALLY AGREES, UNDERTAKES TO GET ITSELF RATED BY CREDIT RATING AGENCY/IES WITHIN A PERIOD OF SIX MONTHS AND/OR AT SUCH INTERVALS AS MAY BE DECIDED BY THE BANK, FAILING WHICH THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO REVIEW THE APPLICABLE INTEREST RATE AND/OR COSTS, CHARGES AND EXPENSES, WHICH SHALL BE PAYABLE BY THE BORROWER/OBLIGOR/SECURITY PROVIDER AND ON SUCH DATE/S OR WITHIN SUCH PERIOD AS MAY BE SPECIFIED BY THE BANK. "CREDIT RATING AGENCY" SHALL MEAN AND REFER TO THE DOMESTIC CREDIT ATING AGENCIES SUCH AS CREDIT ANALYSIS AND RESEARCH LIMITED, CRISIL LIMITED, INDIA RATINGS AND RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED, BRICKWORK RATINGS INDIA PVT. LIMITED, SME RATING AGENCY OF INDIA LIMITED AND ICRA LIMITED AND INTERNATIONAL CREDIT RATING AGENCIES SUCH AS FITCH, MOODYS AND STANDARD & POOR'S AND SUCH OTHER CREDIT RATING AGENCIES IDENTIFIED AND/OR RECOGNIZED BY THE RESERVE BANK OF INDIA FROM TIME TO TIME. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: 1-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. IN CASE THE ENTIRE FACILITY IS NOT DRAWN, THE COOLING PERIOD DOES NOT APPLY TO THE EXTENT OF THE UNDRAWN AMOUNT. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. DOCUMENT REQUIRED: ACCEPTED BILL OF EXCHANGE (INCASE BOE IS NOT THERE BANK MAY CHARGE HIGHER RATE OF INTEREST) REQUEST LETTER OO COPY OF INVOICE OR ORDER COPY COPY OF ANY KIND OF PROOF WHICH SHOWS DELIVERY / DISPATCH OF GOODS / MATERIAL THE BILLS WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE COMPANY TO WHOM THIS FACILITY IS GRANTED IN CASE OF DOCUMENTARY BILLS PURCHASED, RAILWAY RECEIPTS / LORRY RECEIPTS AND OTHER COMMERCIAL DOCUMENTS NEED ACCOMPANY THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE. LORRY RECEIPTS OF ONLY IBA APPROVED TRANSPORT COMPANIES WILL BE ACCEPTED. IN CASE OF CLEAN USANCE BILLS DISCOUNTED, COPIES OF RRS / LRS / AIRWAY BILLS EVIDENCENG DESPATCH OF GOODS TOGETHER WITH RELEVANT INVOICES, RECEIPTED CHALLANS / DELIVERY NOTES ETC., 17 02022017.V1I ICICI BANK SHOULD ACCOMPANY THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE. IN CASE OF DOCUMENTARY USANCE BILLS DISCOUNTED, THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE COVERING DISPATCH OF GOODS SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED BY INVOICES, RRS / LRS OF APPROVED TRANSPORT OPERATORS AND OTHER DOCUMENTS. BILLS WILL BE DRAWN ON GOVERNMENT DEPARTMENTS, CORPORATIONS, REPUTED PUBLIC AND PRIVATE SECTOR UNDERTAKINGS. BANK WILL BE AT LIBERTY TO FIX DRAWEE - WISE SUBLIMITS WITHIN THE OVERALL BILL DISCOUNTING LIMITS, IF FELT NECESSARY BANK ALSO RESERVES THE RIGHT TO PRE-APPROVE THE DRAWEES APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: O THAT THE BILLS AND THE DOCUMENTS TENDERED/SUBMITTED REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS; O THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH BILLS TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; AND O THAT THE TRANSACTIONS HAVE NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES (THE GROUP COMPANIES") GOODS COVERED RAW MATERIAL AND NORMAL CAPITAL GOODS REQUIRED FOR DAY TO DAY WORK / REPAIR INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN FUND BASED AND NON-FUND BASED LIMITS POST SHIPMENT CREDIT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY : FACILITY NAME POST SHIPMENT CREDIT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY (PSCFC) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION DRAWALS IN EQUIVALENT USD (AS A SUB-LIMIT OF CC) PSCFC LIMIT ON RUNNING ACCOUNT BASIS. DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY I.E., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDING UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES: FIRST PARI PASSU CHARGE WITH CONSORTIUM BANKERS BY WAY OF HYPOTHECATION IN FAVOUR OF THE BANK ON THE BORROWER'S ENTIRE STOCKS OF RAW MATERIALS, WORK-IN-PROCESS, SEMI-FINISHED AND FINISHED GOODS, CONSUMABLE STORES AND SPARES AND SUCH OTHER MOVABLES INCLUDING BOOK DEBTS, BILLS, WHETHER DOCUMENTARY OR CLEAN, BOTH PRESENT AND FUTURE. SPECIAL TERMS: SR. PARTICULARS SPECIAL TERM/CONDITION NO 1. OFAC - A) THE BORROWER HEREBY REPRESENTS AND WARRANTS THAT: NEITHER THE BORROWER NOR ANY OTHER PERSON BENEFITING IN ANY CAPACITY IN CONNECTION WITH OR FROM THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT AND/OR ANY INSTRUMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS THEREUNDER IS A SPECIALLY DESIGNATED NATIONAL (SDN) AND/OR OTHERWISE SANCTIONED, UNDER THE SANCTIONS PROMULGATED BY THE UNITED STATES (INCLUDING ITS OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL'S (OFAC))), INDIA, UNITED STATES, UNITED NATIONS, EUROPEAN UNION, THE JURISDICTION OF THE FACILITY OFFICE AND/OR ANY OTHER COUNTRY (COLLECTIVELY, THE "SANCTIONS"). B) THE BORROWER HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGES, COVENANTS AND AGREES THAT: I. THE SANCTIONS MAY BECOME APPLICABLE WITH RESPECT TO THE SAID FACILITIES AND/OR TRANSACTIONS THEREUNDER, 27 2022017.V1W ICICI BANK INCLUDING TO ANY DOCUMENTARY CREDITS AND/OR GUARANTEES ISSUED AND/OR DISBURSEMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS MADE BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT. SANCTIONS MAY PERTAIN INTER ALIA, TO THE PURPOSE AND/OR END USE OF THE SAID FACILITIES, GOODS MANUFACTURED IN OR ORIGINATED FROM/THROUGH CERTAIN COUNTRIES, SHIPMENT FROM/TO/USING CERTAIN COUNTRIES, PORTS, VESSELS, LINERS AND/OR DUE TO INVOLVEMENT OF CERTAIN PERSONS AND ENTITIES (INCLUDING CORRESPONDENT BANKS AND THE FACILITY OFFICE). CONSEQUENTLY, DISBURSEMENT, ISSUANCE, PAYMENT AND/OR PROCESSING UNDER THE SAID FACILITIES BY ICICI BANK MAY BECOME SUBJECTED TO THE SANCTIONS AND ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO REFUSE TO PROCESS ANY TRANSACTIONS THAT VIOLATE/MAY VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS. II. IT SHALL ENSURE THAT THE TRANSACTIONS ENTERED INTO PURSUANT TO THE SANCTION LETTER/ CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT DO NOT VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS AND THAT NO PERSONS, ENTITIES OR OTHERWISE, CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS ARE INVOLVED IN ANY TRANSACTIONS HEREUNDER. THE BORROWER AGREES THAT IT SHALL NOT AVAIL OF THE SAID FACILITIES OR USE THE PROCEEDS OF THE SAID FACILITIES IN ANY TRANSACTION WITH, OR FOR THE PURPOSE OF FINANCING THE ACTIVITIES OF, ANY PERSON CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS AS AFORESAID. IIT IT SHALL INDEMNIFY AND HOLD HARMLESS ICICI BANK, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, FOR ALL LOSSES AND LIABILITIES (INCLUDING DUE TO CLAIMS BY A THIRD PARTY), INCURRED BY ICICI BANK AS A RESULT OF ANY BREACH BY IT OF ITS REPRESENTATIONS AND UNDERTAKINGS CONTAINED HEREIN PERTAINING TO THE SANCTIONS AND/OR DUE TO ANY ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE SANCTIONS. NO ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT, INCLUDING GRANT OF THE SAID FACILITIES, ISSUANCE OF ANY FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS THERE UNDER OR PROCESSING OF ANY B. CIC! 28 02022017.V1G ICICI BANK PAYMENTS OR TRANSACTIONS, NOR ANY ACTION TAKEN BY THE BORROWER IN RELATION THERETO, SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE A WAIVER OF ANY OF ICICI BANK'S RIGHTS UNDER ANY PROVISIONS OF THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY CICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT RELATED TO THE SANCTIONS NOR SHALL THEY ACT TO RELIEVE THE BORROWER OF ITS OBLIGATIONS OR LIABILITIES IN RELATION THERETO. THE BORROWER HEREBY AGREES AND CONFIRMS THAT ANY BREACH OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS STIPULATED HEREIN ABOVE SHALL CONSTITUTE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK. 2 . HEDGING CLAUSE THE BORROWER REPRESENTS THAT IT HAS ADOPTED A SUITABLE HEDGING POLICY, APPROVED BY ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS PARTNERS/ PROPRIETOR/ TRUSTEE/ MEMBERS, WHICH INCLUDES MECHANISMS TO REDUCE ITS CURRENCY MISMATCHES. THE BORROWER'S HEDGING POLICY SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND UPDATED FROM TIME TO TIME, TILL ALL THE MONIES DUE AND PAYABLE UNDER THE FACILITY AGREEMENT/ TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS ARE FULLY PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF THE BANK/ LENDER. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE ALL INFORMATION AS MAY BE REQUIRED BY THE BANK/ LENDER ON A QUARTERLY BASIS OR FROM TIME TO TIME IN RELATION TO ITS FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURES AND HEDGING DETAILS IN RELATION THERETO. IN THE EVENT OF ANY CHANGE IN APPLICABLE LAWS/ REGULATIONS (INCLUDING REGULATORY/STATUTORY REQUIREMENTS PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE), THE BANK/ LENDER SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO RECOVER THE COST, IN ANY MANNER THAT IT DEEMS FIT, INCLUDING BY WAY OF REVISION IN SPREAD/APPLICABLE RATE. IF THE BORROWER HAS UNHEDGED FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURE, THEN THE BANK WILL RESERVE A RIGHT TO INCREASE THE PRICING. 3. UNCONDITIONAL NOTWITHSTANDING ANYTHING CONTAINED IN THE TRANSACTION CANCELLATION CLAUSE DOCUMENTS, THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO CANCEL THE UNUTILIZED PORTION OF THE FACILITY, IN WHOLE OR IN PART, AT ANY TIME DURING THE SUBSISTENCE OF THE FACILITY, WITHOUT GIVING ANY PRIOR NOTICE TO THE BORROWER, FOR ANY REASON WHATSOEVER, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, ON THE OCCURRENCE OF DETERIORATION OF CREDITWORTHINESS OF THE ICICI BA 29 02022017.V1WICICI BANK BORROWER, OR FOR NONCOMPLIANCE OF ANY TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS. FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE, 'DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS' SHALL INCLUDE WITHOUT LIMITATION; THE FOLLOWING EVENTS: (I) DOWNGRADE THE RATING OF THE BORROWER BY A CREDIT RATING AGENCY; (II INCLUSION OF THE BORROWER AND/OR ANY OF ITS DIRECTORS IN THE RBI'S WILLFUL DEFAULTERS LIST; (III) CLOSURE OF A SIGNIFICANT PORTION OF THE BORROWER'S OPERATING CAPACITY; (IV) DECLINE IN THE PROFIT AFTER TAX OF THE BORROWER BY MORE THAN FIFTEEN PERCENT; ( V ) ANY ADVERSE COMMENT FROM AN AUDITOR; AND (VI) ANY OTHER REASON/EVENT IN THE OPINION OF THE BANK, CONSTITUTING OR WHICH MAY CONSTITUTE, DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS THE BORROWER UNCONDITIONALLY AGREES, UNDERTAKES TO GET ITSELF RATED BY CREDIT RATING AGENCY/IES WITHIN A PERIOD OF SIX MONTHS AND/OR AT SUCH INTERVALS AS MAY BE DECIDED BY THE BANK, FAILING WHICH THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO REVIEW THE APPLICABLE INTEREST RATE AND/OR COSTS, CHARGES AND EXPENSES, WHICH SHALL BE PAYABLE BY THE BORROWER/OBLIGOR/SECURITY PROVIDER AND ON SUCH DATE/S OR WITHIN SUCH PERIOD AS MAY BE SPECIFIED BY THE BANK. "CREDIT RATING AGENCY" SHALL MEAN AND REFER TO THE DOMESTIC CREDIT ATING AGENCIES SUCH AS CREDIT ANALYSIS AND RESEARCH LIMITED, CRISIL LIMITED, INDIA RATINGS AND RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED, BRICKWORK RATINGS INDIA PVT. LIMITED, SME RATING AGENCY OF INDIA LIMITED AND ICRA LIMITED AND INTERNATIONAL CREDIT RATING AGENCIES SUCH AS FITCH, MOODYS AND STANDARD & POOR'S AND SUCH OTHER CREDIT RATING AGENCIES IDENTIFIED AND/OR RECOGNIZED BY THE RESERVE BANK OF INDIA FROM TIME TO TIME. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. PRICING THE RATE OF INTEREST STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK SHALL BE SUM OF 1- ANA 4 12072017.V1I ICICI BANK MCLR-6M AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM OF I- MCLR-6M, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY, ON THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT O THE LOAN REMAINS OUTSTANDING EACH DAY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. TENURE INDIVIDUAL DRAW-DOWN CAN BE OF VARYING MATURITIES, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM TENOR OF 30 DAYS AND A MAXIMUM TENOR OF 180 DAYS FOR EACH TRANCHE OUT OF THE FACILITY. THE FINAL MATURITY OF ANY TRANCHE SHALL BE WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19,2020 REPAYMENT TERMS PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF EACH TRANCHE IS TO BE REPAID AS BULLET PAYMENT ON THE MATURITY DATE OR IN INSTALLMENTS AS AGREED UPON, BUT WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY BA 5 02027017.V1V ICICI BANK PRICING THE FIXED RATE OF INTEREST FOR EACH DRAWAL OF THE FACILITY WILL BE STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK AT THE TIME OF DISBURSEMENT OF EACH DRAWAL, WHICH SHALL BE SUM OF I-MCLR # AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO MINIMUM OF I-MCLR #, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-3M IS 8.00% AND I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.50%. #NOTE: 1-MCLR WILL BE BASED ON THE TENURE OF THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWALS UNDER THE FACILITY: . DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3-MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY CONDITION CERTIFICATE FROM ITS STATUTORY AUDITOR OR ANY OF ITS KEY MANAGERIAL PRECEDENTS PERSONNEL, DULY AUTHORIZED BY REQUISITE CORPORATE AUTHORIZATIONS, 6 02022017.V1PICICI BANK CONDITION REGARDING THE END USE OF THE FACILITY AND CERTIFYING THAT THE FACILITY SUBSEQUENT HAS BEEN UTILIZED FOR THE PURPOSE, AND NOT DIVERTED OR APPLIED FOR SPECIAL CONDITIONS ANY OTHER PURPOSE WITHIN 30 DAYS FROM THE DISBURSEMENT OF FUNDS "KEY MANAGERIAL PERSONNEL" SHALL HAVE THE MEANING ASSIGNED TO IT IN THE COMPANIES ACT, 2013 DRAWDOWN MINIMUM OF INR 10.0 MILLION PER DRAW DOWN / TRANCHE; DRAW DOWN MATURITY UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE SUBJECT TO A WRITTEN REQUEST / NOTICE OF TWO BUSINESS DAYS IN ADVANCE COMMITMENT FEE NI COOLING PERIOD ONCE THE FACILITY IS FULLY DRAWN, ANY FURTHER TRANCHE/DISBURSEMENT WILL BE ALLOWED ONLY AFTER 1 CLEAR WORKING DAYS FROM THE DATE OFF REPAYMENT OF ANY OF THE OUTSTANDING TRANCHE, SUBJECT TO OVERALL FACILITY LIMIT. IN CASE THE ENTIRE FACILITY IS NOT DRAWN, THE COOLING PERIOD DOES NOT APPLY TO THE EXTENT OF THE UNDRAWN AMOUNT. BANK WILL MARK OFF INDIVIDUAL EXPORT BILLS AS AND WHEN THEY ARE RECEIVED FOR NEGOTIATION/ COLLECTION ON 'FIRST IN FIRST OUT' (FIFO) OASIS. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. GENERAL . DOCUMENT REQUIRED: ACCEPTED BILL OF EXCHANGE (INCASE BOE IS NOT THERE BANK MAY CHARGE HIGHER RATE OF INTEREST) REQUEST LETTER OO COPY OF INVOICE OR ORDER COPY COPY OF ANY KIND OF PROOF WHICH SHOWS DELIVERY / DISPATCH OF GOODS / MATERIAL THE BILLS WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE COMPANY TO WHOM THIS FACILITY IS GRANTED IN CASE OF DOCUMENTARY BILLS PURCHASED, RAILWAY RECEIPTS / LORRY RECEIPTS AND OTHER COMMERCIAL DOCUMENTS NEED ACCOMPANY THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE. LORRY RECEIPTS OF ONLY IBA APPROVED TRANSPORT COMPANIES WILL BE ACCEPTED. IN CASE OF CLEAN USANCE BILLS DISCOUNTED, COPIES OF RRS / LRS / AIRWAY BILLS EVIDENCENG DESPATCH OF GOODS TOGETHER WITH RELEVANT INVOICES, RECEIPTED CHALLANS / DELIVERY NOTES ETC., 17 02022017.V1I ICICI BANK SHOULD ACCOMPANY THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE. IN CASE OF DOCUMENTARY USANCE BILLS DISCOUNTED, THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE COVERING DISPATCH OF GOODS SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED BY INVOICES, RRS / LRS OF APPROVED TRANSPORT OPERATORS AND OTHER DOCUMENTS. BILLS WILL BE DRAWN ON GOVERNMENT DEPARTMENTS, CORPORATIONS, REPUTED PUBLIC AND PRIVATE SECTOR UNDERTAKINGS. BANK WILL BE AT LIBERTY TO FIX DRAWEE - WISE SUBLIMITS WITHIN THE OVERALL BILL DISCOUNTING LIMITS, IF FELT NECESSARY BANK ALSO RESERVES THE RIGHT TO PRE-APPROVE THE DRAWEES APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: O THAT THE BILLS AND THE DOCUMENTS TENDERED/SUBMITTED REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS; O THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH BILLS TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; AND O THAT THE TRANSACTIONS HAVE NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES (THE GROUP COMPANIES") GOODS COVERED RAW MATERIAL AND NORMAL CAPITAL GOODS REQUIRED FOR DAY TO DAY WORK / REPAIR INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN FUND BASED AND NON-FUND BASED LIMITS POST SHIPMENT CREDIT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY : FACILITY NAME POST SHIPMENT CREDIT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY (PSCFC) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION DRAWALS IN EQUIVALENT USD (AS A SUB-LIMIT OF CC) PSCFC LIMIT ON RUNNING ACCOUNT BASIS. OTHER TERMS EXPORT FINANCE IS SUBJECT TO RBI GUIDELINES ISSUED FROM TIME-TO-TIME. DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY I.E., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDING UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. DIRECT DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY EXPORTERS WITH OVERSEAS BANKS AND / OR ANY AGENCY WILL BE DONE ONLY THROUGH THE BRANCH OF ICICI BANK DESIGNATED FOR THIS PURPOSE. DISBURSEMENT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WOULD BE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY OF FOREX. IF ANY PCFC / EPC HAS BEEN AVAILED AGAINST THE SAME UNDERLYING DOCUMENT THEN THE SAME OUTSTANDING WILL BE ADJUSTED FROM THE PROCEEDS OF PSCFC. ALL FACILITIES IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WILL BE GOVERNED BY RBI / FEMA GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES: FIRST PARI PASSU CHARGE WITH CONSORTIUM BANKERS BY WAY OF HYPOTHECATION IN FAVOUR OF THE BANK ON THE BORROWER'S ENTIRE STOCKS OF RAW MATERIALS, WORK-IN-PROCESS, SEMI-FINISHED AND FINISHED GOODS, CONSUMABLE STORES AND SPARES AND SUCH OTHER MOVABLES INCLUDING BOOK DEBTS, BILLS, WHETHER DOCUMENTARY OR CLEAN, BOTH PRESENT AND FUTURE. SPECIAL TERMS: SR. PARTICULARS SPECIAL TERM/CONDITION NO 1. OFAC - A) THE BORROWER HEREBY REPRESENTS AND WARRANTS THAT: NEITHER THE BORROWER NOR ANY OTHER PERSON BENEFITING IN ANY CAPACITY IN CONNECTION WITH OR FROM THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT AND/OR ANY INSTRUMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS THEREUNDER IS A SPECIALLY DESIGNATED NATIONAL (SDN) AND/OR OTHERWISE SANCTIONED, UNDER THE SANCTIONS PROMULGATED BY THE UNITED STATES (INCLUDING ITS OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL'S (OFAC))), INDIA, UNITED STATES, UNITED NATIONS, EUROPEAN UNION, THE JURISDICTION OF THE FACILITY OFFICE AND/OR ANY OTHER COUNTRY (COLLECTIVELY, THE "SANCTIONS"). B) THE BORROWER HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGES, COVENANTS AND AGREES THAT: I. THE SANCTIONS MAY BECOME APPLICABLE WITH RESPECT TO THE SAID FACILITIES AND/OR TRANSACTIONS THEREUNDER, 27 2022017.V1W ICICI BANK INCLUDING TO ANY DOCUMENTARY CREDITS AND/OR GUARANTEES ISSUED AND/OR DISBURSEMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS MADE BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT. SANCTIONS MAY PERTAIN INTER ALIA, TO THE PURPOSE AND/OR END USE OF THE SAID FACILITIES, GOODS MANUFACTURED IN OR ORIGINATED FROM/THROUGH CERTAIN COUNTRIES, SHIPMENT FROM/TO/USING CERTAIN COUNTRIES, PORTS, VESSELS, LINERS AND/OR DUE TO INVOLVEMENT OF CERTAIN PERSONS AND ENTITIES (INCLUDING CORRESPONDENT BANKS AND THE FACILITY OFFICE). CONSEQUENTLY, DISBURSEMENT, ISSUANCE, PAYMENT AND/OR PROCESSING UNDER THE SAID FACILITIES BY ICICI BANK MAY BECOME SUBJECTED TO THE SANCTIONS AND ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO REFUSE TO PROCESS ANY TRANSACTIONS THAT VIOLATE/MAY VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS. II. IT SHALL ENSURE THAT THE TRANSACTIONS ENTERED INTO PURSUANT TO THE SANCTION LETTER/ CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT DO NOT VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS AND THAT NO PERSONS, ENTITIES OR OTHERWISE, CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS ARE INVOLVED IN ANY TRANSACTIONS HEREUNDER. THE BORROWER AGREES THAT IT SHALL NOT AVAIL OF THE SAID FACILITIES OR USE THE PROCEEDS OF THE SAID FACILITIES IN ANY TRANSACTION WITH, OR FOR THE PURPOSE OF FINANCING THE ACTIVITIES OF, ANY PERSON CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS AS AFORESAID. IIT IT SHALL INDEMNIFY AND HOLD HARMLESS ICICI BANK, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, FOR ALL LOSSES AND LIABILITIES (INCLUDING DUE TO CLAIMS BY A THIRD PARTY), INCURRED BY ICICI BANK AS A RESULT OF ANY BREACH BY IT OF ITS REPRESENTATIONS AND UNDERTAKINGS CONTAINED HEREIN PERTAINING TO THE SANCTIONS AND/OR DUE TO ANY ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE SANCTIONS. NO ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT, INCLUDING GRANT OF THE SAID FACILITIES, ISSUANCE OF ANY FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS THERE UNDER OR PROCESSING OF ANY B. CIC! 28 02022017.V1G ICICI BANK PAYMENTS OR TRANSACTIONS, NOR ANY ACTION TAKEN BY THE BORROWER IN RELATION THERETO, SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE A WAIVER OF ANY OF ICICI BANK'S RIGHTS UNDER ANY PROVISIONS OF THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY CICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT RELATED TO THE SANCTIONS NOR SHALL THEY ACT TO RELIEVE THE BORROWER OF ITS OBLIGATIONS OR LIABILITIES IN RELATION THERETO. THE BORROWER HEREBY AGREES AND CONFIRMS THAT ANY BREACH OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS STIPULATED HEREIN ABOVE SHALL CONSTITUTE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK. 2 . HEDGING CLAUSE THE BORROWER REPRESENTS THAT IT HAS ADOPTED A SUITABLE HEDGING POLICY, APPROVED BY ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS PARTNERS/ PROPRIETOR/ TRUSTEE/ MEMBERS, WHICH INCLUDES MECHANISMS TO REDUCE ITS CURRENCY MISMATCHES. THE BORROWER'S HEDGING POLICY SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND UPDATED FROM TIME TO TIME, TILL ALL THE MONIES DUE AND PAYABLE UNDER THE FACILITY AGREEMENT/ TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS ARE FULLY PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF THE BANK/ LENDER. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE ALL INFORMATION AS MAY BE REQUIRED BY THE BANK/ LENDER ON A QUARTERLY BASIS OR FROM TIME TO TIME IN RELATION TO ITS FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURES AND HEDGING DETAILS IN RELATION THERETO. IN THE EVENT OF ANY CHANGE IN APPLICABLE LAWS/ REGULATIONS (INCLUDING REGULATORY/STATUTORY REQUIREMENTS PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE), THE BANK/ LENDER SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO RECOVER THE COST, IN ANY MANNER THAT IT DEEMS FIT, INCLUDING BY WAY OF REVISION IN SPREAD/APPLICABLE RATE. IF THE BORROWER HAS UNHEDGED FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURE, THEN THE BANK WILL RESERVE A RIGHT TO INCREASE THE PRICING. 3. UNCONDITIONAL NOTWITHSTANDING ANYTHING CONTAINED IN THE TRANSACTION CANCELLATION CLAUSE DOCUMENTS, THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO CANCEL THE UNUTILIZED PORTION OF THE FACILITY, IN WHOLE OR IN PART, AT ANY TIME DURING THE SUBSISTENCE OF THE FACILITY, WITHOUT GIVING ANY PRIOR NOTICE TO THE BORROWER, FOR ANY REASON WHATSOEVER, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, ON THE OCCURRENCE OF DETERIORATION OF CREDITWORTHINESS OF THE ICICI BA 29 02022017.V1WICICI BANK BORROWER, OR FOR NONCOMPLIANCE OF ANY TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS. FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE, 'DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS' SHALL INCLUDE WITHOUT LIMITATION; THE FOLLOWING EVENTS: (I) DOWNGRADE THE RATING OF THE BORROWER BY A CREDIT RATING AGENCY; (II INCLUSION OF THE BORROWER AND/OR ANY OF ITS DIRECTORS IN THE RBI'S WILLFUL DEFAULTERS LIST; (III) CLOSURE OF A SIGNIFICANT PORTION OF THE BORROWER'S OPERATING CAPACITY; (IV) DECLINE IN THE PROFIT AFTER TAX OF THE BORROWER BY MORE THAN FIFTEEN PERCENT; ( V ) ANY ADVERSE COMMENT FROM AN AUDITOR; AND (VI) ANY OTHER REASON/EVENT IN THE OPINION OF THE BANK, CONSTITUTING OR WHICH MAY CONSTITUTE, DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS THE BORROWER UNCONDITIONALLY AGREES, UNDERTAKES TO GET ITSELF RATED BY CREDIT RATING AGENCY/IES WITHIN A PERIOD OF SIX MONTHS AND/OR AT SUCH INTERVALS AS MAY BE DECIDED BY THE BANK, FAILING WHICH THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO REVIEW THE APPLICABLE INTEREST RATE AND/OR COSTS, CHARGES AND EXPENSES, WHICH SHALL BE PAYABLE BY THE BORROWER/OBLIGOR/SECURITY PROVIDER AND ON SUCH DATE/S OR WITHIN SUCH PERIOD AS MAY BE SPECIFIED BY THE BANK. "CREDIT RATING AGENCY" SHALL MEAN AND REFER TO THE DOMESTIC CREDIT ATING AGENCIES SUCH AS CREDIT ANALYSIS AND RESEARCH LIMITED, CRISIL LIMITED, INDIA RATINGS AND RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED, BRICKWORK RATINGS INDIA PVT. LIMITED, SME RATING AGENCY OF INDIA LIMITED AND ICRA LIMITED AND INTERNATIONAL CREDIT RATING AGENCIES SUCH AS FITCH, MOODYS AND STANDARD & POOR'S AND SUCH OTHER CREDIT RATING AGENCIES IDENTIFIED AND/OR RECOGNIZED BY THE RESERVE BANK OF INDIA FROM TIME TO TIME. WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN NON-FUND BASED AND FUND BASED LIMIT REPAYMENT TERMS THE BORROWER SHALL, UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED TO BY THE BANK, REPAY TO THE BANK FORTHWITH ON DEMAND SUCH OF THE AMOUNT AS MAY BE OUTSTANDING OF THE RELEVANT ACCOUNT IN RESPECT OF THE CASH CREDIT FACILITY, TOGETHER WITH ALL INTEREST, COSTS, CHARGES, EXPENSES AND MONIES WHATSOEVER STIPULATED IN, OR PAYABLE UNDER, THE FACILITY AGREEMENT AND/OR THE OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT. PRICING THE RATE OF INTEREST STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK SHALL BE SUM OF 1- ANA 4 12072017.V1I ICICI BANK MCLR-6M AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM OF I- MCLR-6M, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY, ON THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT O THE LOAN REMAINS OUTSTANDING EACH DAY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. THE FINAL MATURITY OF ANY TRANCHE SHALL BE WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY VALIDITY NOVEMBER 19,2020 REPAYMENT TERMS PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF EACH TRANCHE IS TO BE REPAID AS BULLET PAYMENT ON THE MATURITY DATE OR IN INSTALLMENTS AS AGREED UPON, BUT WITHIN THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY BA 5 02027017.V1V ICICI BANK PRICING THE FIXED RATE OF INTEREST FOR EACH DRAWAL OF THE FACILITY WILL BE STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK AT THE TIME OF DISBURSEMENT OF EACH DRAWAL, WHICH SHALL BE SUM OF I-MCLR # AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO MINIMUM OF I-MCLR #, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY. DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3-MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. DOCUMENT REQUIRED: ACCEPTED BILL OF EXCHANGE (INCASE BOE IS NOT THERE BANK MAY CHARGE HIGHER RATE OF INTEREST) REQUEST LETTER OO COPY OF INVOICE OR ORDER COPY COPY OF ANY KIND OF PROOF WHICH SHOWS DELIVERY / DISPATCH OF GOODS / MATERIAL THE BILLS WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE COMPANY TO WHOM THIS FACILITY IS GRANTED IN CASE OF DOCUMENTARY BILLS PURCHASED, RAILWAY RECEIPTS / LORRY RECEIPTS AND OTHER COMMERCIAL DOCUMENTS NEED ACCOMPANY THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE. LORRY RECEIPTS OF ONLY IBA APPROVED TRANSPORT COMPANIES WILL BE ACCEPTED. IN CASE OF CLEAN USANCE BILLS DISCOUNTED, COPIES OF RRS / LRS / AIRWAY BILLS EVIDENCENG DESPATCH OF GOODS TOGETHER WITH RELEVANT INVOICES, RECEIPTED CHALLANS / DELIVERY NOTES ETC., 17 02022017.V1I ICICI BANK SHOULD ACCOMPANY THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE. IN CASE OF DOCUMENTARY USANCE BILLS DISCOUNTED, THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE COVERING DISPATCH OF GOODS SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED BY INVOICES, RRS / LRS OF APPROVED TRANSPORT OPERATORS AND OTHER DOCUMENTS. BILLS WILL BE DRAWN ON GOVERNMENT DEPARTMENTS, CORPORATIONS, REPUTED PUBLIC AND PRIVATE SECTOR UNDERTAKINGS. BANK WILL BE AT LIBERTY TO FIX DRAWEE - WISE SUBLIMITS WITHIN THE OVERALL BILL DISCOUNTING LIMITS, IF FELT NECESSARY BANK ALSO RESERVES THE RIGHT TO PRE-APPROVE THE DRAWEES APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: O THAT THE BILLS AND THE DOCUMENTS TENDERED/SUBMITTED REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS; O THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH BILLS TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; AND O THAT THE TRANSACTIONS HAVE NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES (THE GROUP COMPANIES") GOODS COVERED RAW MATERIAL AND NORMAL CAPITAL GOODS REQUIRED FOR DAY TO DAY WORK / REPAIR INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN FUND BASED AND NON-FUND BASED LIMITS POST SHIPMENT CREDIT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY : FACILITY NAME POST SHIPMENT CREDIT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY (PSCFC) PROPOSED LIMIT INR 250.0 MILLION DRAWALS IN EQUIVALENT USD (AS A SUB-LIMIT OF CC) PSCFC LIMIT ON RUNNING ACCOUNT BASIS. SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES: FIRST PARI PASSU CHARGE WITH CONSORTIUM BANKERS BY WAY OF HYPOTHECATION IN FAVOUR OF THE BANK ON THE BORROWER'S ENTIRE STOCKS OF RAW MATERIALS, WORK-IN-PROCESS, SEMI-FINISHED AND FINISHED GOODS, CONSUMABLE STORES AND SPARES AND SUCH OTHER MOVABLES INCLUDING BOOK DEBTS, BILLS, WHETHER DOCUMENTARY OR CLEAN, BOTH PRESENT AND FUTURE. SPECIAL TERMS: SR. PARTICULARS SPECIAL TERM/CONDITION NO 1. OFAC - A) THE BORROWER HEREBY REPRESENTS AND WARRANTS THAT: NEITHER THE BORROWER NOR ANY OTHER PERSON BENEFITING IN ANY CAPACITY IN CONNECTION WITH OR FROM THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT AND/OR ANY INSTRUMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS THEREUNDER IS A SPECIALLY DESIGNATED NATIONAL (SDN) AND/OR OTHERWISE SANCTIONED, UNDER THE SANCTIONS PROMULGATED BY THE UNITED STATES (INCLUDING ITS OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL'S (OFAC))), INDIA, UNITED STATES, UNITED NATIONS, EUROPEAN UNION, THE JURISDICTION OF THE FACILITY OFFICE AND/OR ANY OTHER COUNTRY (COLLECTIVELY, THE "SANCTIONS"). B) THE BORROWER HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGES, COVENANTS AND AGREES THAT: I. THE SANCTIONS MAY BECOME APPLICABLE WITH RESPECT TO THE SAID FACILITIES AND/OR TRANSACTIONS THEREUNDER, 27 2022017.V1W ICICI BANK INCLUDING TO ANY DOCUMENTARY CREDITS AND/OR GUARANTEES ISSUED AND/OR DISBURSEMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS MADE BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT. SANCTIONS MAY PERTAIN INTER ALIA, TO THE PURPOSE AND/OR END USE OF THE SAID FACILITIES, GOODS MANUFACTURED IN OR ORIGINATED FROM/THROUGH CERTAIN COUNTRIES, SHIPMENT FROM/TO/USING CERTAIN COUNTRIES, PORTS, VESSELS, LINERS AND/OR DUE TO INVOLVEMENT OF CERTAIN PERSONS AND ENTITIES (INCLUDING CORRESPONDENT BANKS AND THE FACILITY OFFICE). CONSEQUENTLY, DISBURSEMENT, ISSUANCE, PAYMENT AND/OR PROCESSING UNDER THE SAID FACILITIES BY ICICI BANK MAY BECOME SUBJECTED TO THE SANCTIONS AND ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO REFUSE TO PROCESS ANY TRANSACTIONS THAT VIOLATE/MAY VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS. II. IT SHALL ENSURE THAT THE TRANSACTIONS ENTERED INTO PURSUANT TO THE SANCTION LETTER/ CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT DO NOT VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS AND THAT NO PERSONS, ENTITIES OR OTHERWISE, CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS ARE INVOLVED IN ANY TRANSACTIONS HEREUNDER. THE BORROWER AGREES THAT IT SHALL NOT AVAIL OF THE SAID FACILITIES OR USE THE PROCEEDS OF THE SAID FACILITIES IN ANY TRANSACTION WITH, OR FOR THE PURPOSE OF FINANCING THE ACTIVITIES OF, ANY PERSON CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS AS AFORESAID. IIT IT SHALL INDEMNIFY AND HOLD HARMLESS ICICI BANK, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, FOR ALL LOSSES AND LIABILITIES (INCLUDING DUE TO CLAIMS BY A THIRD PARTY), INCURRED BY ICICI BANK AS A RESULT OF ANY BREACH BY IT OF ITS REPRESENTATIONS AND UNDERTAKINGS CONTAINED HEREIN PERTAINING TO THE SANCTIONS AND/OR DUE TO ANY ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE SANCTIONS. NO ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT, INCLUDING GRANT OF THE SAID FACILITIES, ISSUANCE OF ANY FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS THERE UNDER OR PROCESSING OF ANY B. CIC! 28 02022017.V1G ICICI BANK PAYMENTS OR TRANSACTIONS, NOR ANY ACTION TAKEN BY THE BORROWER IN RELATION THERETO, SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE A WAIVER OF ANY OF ICICI BANK'S RIGHTS UNDER ANY PROVISIONS OF THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY CICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT RELATED TO THE SANCTIONS NOR SHALL THEY ACT TO RELIEVE THE BORROWER OF ITS OBLIGATIONS OR LIABILITIES IN RELATION THERETO. THE BORROWER HEREBY AGREES AND CONFIRMS THAT ANY BREACH OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS STIPULATED HEREIN ABOVE SHALL CONSTITUTE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK. 2 . HEDGING CLAUSE THE BORROWER REPRESENTS THAT IT HAS ADOPTED A SUITABLE HEDGING POLICY, APPROVED BY ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS PARTNERS/ PROPRIETOR/ TRUSTEE/ MEMBERS, WHICH INCLUDES MECHANISMS TO REDUCE ITS CURRENCY MISMATCHES. THE BORROWER'S HEDGING POLICY SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND UPDATED FROM TIME TO TIME, TILL ALL THE MONIES DUE AND PAYABLE UNDER THE FACILITY AGREEMENT/ TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS ARE FULLY PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF THE BANK/ LENDER. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE ALL INFORMATION AS MAY BE REQUIRED BY THE BANK/ LENDER ON A QUARTERLY BASIS OR FROM TIME TO TIME IN RELATION TO ITS FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURES AND HEDGING DETAILS IN RELATION THERETO. IN THE EVENT OF ANY CHANGE IN APPLICABLE LAWS/ REGULATIONS (INCLUDING REGULATORY/STATUTORY REQUIREMENTS PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE), THE BANK/ LENDER SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO RECOVER THE COST, IN ANY MANNER THAT IT DEEMS FIT, INCLUDING BY WAY OF REVISION IN SPREAD/APPLICABLE RATE. IF THE BORROWER HAS UNHEDGED FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURE, THEN THE BANK WILL RESERVE A RIGHT TO INCREASE THE PRICING. 3. UNCONDITIONAL NOTWITHSTANDING ANYTHING CONTAINED IN THE TRANSACTION CANCELLATION CLAUSE DOCUMENTS, THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO CANCEL THE UNUTILIZED PORTION OF THE FACILITY, IN WHOLE OR IN PART, AT ANY TIME DURING THE SUBSISTENCE OF THE FACILITY, WITHOUT GIVING ANY PRIOR NOTICE TO THE BORROWER, FOR ANY REASON WHATSOEVER, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, ON THE OCCURRENCE OF DETERIORATION OF CREDITWORTHINESS OF THE ICICI BA 29 02022017.V1WICICI BANK BORROWER, OR FOR NONCOMPLIANCE OF ANY TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS. FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE, 'DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS' SHALL INCLUDE WITHOUT LIMITATION; THE FOLLOWING EVENTS: (I) DOWNGRADE THE RATING OF THE BORROWER BY A CREDIT RATING AGENCY; (II INCLUSION OF THE BORROWER AND/OR ANY OF ITS DIRECTORS IN THE RBI'S WILLFUL DEFAULTERS LIST; (III) CLOSURE OF A SIGNIFICANT PORTION OF THE BORROWER'S OPERATING CAPACITY; (IV) DECLINE IN THE PROFIT AFTER TAX OF THE BORROWER BY MORE THAN FIFTEEN PERCENT; ( V ) ANY ADVERSE COMMENT FROM AN AUDITOR; AND (VI) ANY OTHER REASON/EVENT IN THE OPINION OF THE BANK, CONSTITUTING OR WHICH MAY CONSTITUTE, DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS THE BORROWER UNCONDITIONALLY AGREES, UNDERTAKES TO GET ITSELF RATED BY CREDIT RATING AGENCY/IES WITHIN A PERIOD OF SIX MONTHS AND/OR AT SUCH INTERVALS AS MAY BE DECIDED BY THE BANK, FAILING WHICH THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO REVIEW THE APPLICABLE INTEREST RATE AND/OR COSTS, CHARGES AND EXPENSES, WHICH SHALL BE PAYABLE BY THE BORROWER/OBLIGOR/SECURITY PROVIDER AND ON SUCH DATE/S OR WITHIN SUCH PERIOD AS MAY BE SPECIFIED BY THE BANK. "CREDIT RATING AGENCY" SHALL MEAN AND REFER TO THE DOMESTIC CREDIT ATING AGENCIES SUCH AS CREDIT ANALYSIS AND RESEARCH LIMITED, CRISIL LIMITED, INDIA RATINGS AND RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED, BRICKWORK RATINGS INDIA PVT. LIMITED, SME RATING AGENCY OF INDIA LIMITED AND ICRA LIMITED AND INTERNATIONAL CREDIT RATING AGENCIES SUCH AS FITCH, MOODYS AND STANDARD & POOR'S AND SUCH OTHER CREDIT RATING AGENCIES IDENTIFIED AND/OR RECOGNIZED BY THE RESERVE BANK OF INDIA FROM TIME TO TIME. BASEL- IL CLAUSE ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE AN UNCONDITIONAL AND UNFETTERED RIGHT TO CANCEL THE OUTSTANDING UN-DRAWN COMMITMENTS UNDER THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS AT ANY TIME DURING THE CURRENCY OF THE FACILITY ADVANCED UNDER THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS WITHOUT GIVING ANY PRIOR NOTICE TO THE BORROWER. 3. CONSEQUENCES OF ICICI BANK MAY, AT ITS SOLE DISCRETION, RECALL OR ACCELERATE THE EVENT OF DEFAULTS FACILITY, IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER HAS COMMITTED DEFAULT UNDER THE AGREEMENT IN THE OPINION OF THE ICICI BANK AND/ OR ICICI BANK HAS REASONABLE APPREHENSION ABOUT THE BORROWER COMMITTING DEFAULT UNDER THE AGREEMENT. 4. PROVISIONS RELATING THE BORROWER AND / OR ANY OTHER PERSON ("SECURITY PROVIDER") TO INSURANCE WHO HAS PROVIDED / AGREED TO PROVIDE THE SECURITY FOR THE APPLICABLE TO FACILITY SHALL KEEP / CAUSE TO KEEP INSURED THE ASSETS CHARGED / SECURED ASSETS TO BE CHARGED TO ICICI BANK AGAINST, UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED IN THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("CAL") OR ANY AMENDMENT THERETO OR THE SANCTION LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK, SUCH RISKS AS MAY BE SPECIFIED BY ICICI BANK FROM TIME TO TIME. THE SECURITY PROVIDER SHALL DULY PAY / CAUSE TO BE PAID ALL PREMIA AND OTHER SUMS PAYABLE FOR THE AFORESAID PURPOSE. THE INSURANCE IN RESPECT OF THE AFORESAID ASSETS SHALL BE TAKEN IN THE JOINT NAMES OF THE SECURITY PROVIDER AND ICICI BANK AND ANY OTHER PERSON OR INSTITUTION HAVING AN INSURABLE INTEREST IN THE ASSETS (PURSUANT TO THE APPROVAL OF ICICI BANK) AND ACCEPTABLE TO ICICI BANK OR ICICI BANK'S NAME SHOULD BE NOTED AS FIRST LOSS PAYEE ON SUCH INSURANCE POLICIES. PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THERE SHALL, BE NO OBLIGATION ON ICICI BANK TO PAY THE INSURANCE PREMIA IN CASE THE BORROWER / SECURITY PROVIDER FAILS TO PAY THE SAME AND IT SHALL BE A TERM OF SUCH POLICY THAT ICICI BANK SHALL NOT BE DEEMED TO HAVE ANY OBLIGATION OR LIABILITY AS A RESULT OF BEING A CO-INSURED. THE BORROWER AGREES THAT, IN THE EVENT OF FAILURE ON THE PART OF THE BORROWER / THE SECURITY PROVIDER TO INSURE THE ASSETS OR TO PAY THE INSURANCE PREMIA OR OTHER SUMS REFERRED TO ABOVE, ICICI BANK MAY AT ITS SOLE DISCRETION GET THE ASSETS INSURED OR * 39 32027017.V1ICICI BANK 154 RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER DATE: JANUARY 20,2020 REF. WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. INTERCHANGEABILITY FULL TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN NON-FUND BASED AND FUND BASED LIMIT REPAYMENT TERMS THE BORROWER SHALL, UNLESS OTHERWISE AGREED TO BY THE BANK, REPAY TO THE BANK FORTHWITH ON DEMAND SUCH OF THE AMOUNT AS MAY BE OUTSTANDING OF THE RELEVANT ACCOUNT IN RESPECT OF THE CASH CREDIT FACILITY, TOGETHER WITH ALL INTEREST, COSTS, CHARGES, EXPENSES AND MONIES WHATSOEVER STIPULATED IN, OR PAYABLE UNDER, THE FACILITY AGREEMENT AND/OR THE OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT. PRICING THE RATE OF INTEREST STIPULATED BY ICICI BANK SHALL BE SUM OF 1- ANA 4 12072017.V1I ICICI BANK MCLR-6M AND "SPREAD" PER ANNUM, SUBJECT TO A MINIMUM OF I- MCLR-6M, PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY, ON THE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT O THE LOAN REMAINS OUTSTANDING EACH DAY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. DRAWALS FOR UPTO 3-MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-3M . DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6-MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: I-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTENT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. ANY OTHER CONDITION AS MAY BE APPLICABLE AS PER EXISTING WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES AND SPECIFIED BY ICICI BANK PURCHASER/S PURCHASER/S OF GOODS AND SERVICES FROM THE BORROWER; THE EXPRESSION "PURCHASER/S" INCLUDES, UNLESS IT BE REPUGNANT TO THE SUBJECT OR CONTEXT THEREOF, ITS SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS. DOCUMENT REQUIRED: ACCEPTED BILL OF EXCHANGE (INCASE BOE IS NOT THERE BANK MAY CHARGE HIGHER RATE OF INTEREST) REQUEST LETTER OO COPY OF INVOICE OR ORDER COPY COPY OF ANY KIND OF PROOF WHICH SHOWS DELIVERY / DISPATCH OF GOODS / MATERIAL THE BILLS WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE COMPANY TO WHOM THIS FACILITY IS GRANTED IN CASE OF DOCUMENTARY BILLS PURCHASED, RAILWAY RECEIPTS / LORRY RECEIPTS AND OTHER COMMERCIAL DOCUMENTS NEED ACCOMPANY THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE. LORRY RECEIPTS OF ONLY IBA APPROVED TRANSPORT COMPANIES WILL BE ACCEPTED. IN CASE OF CLEAN USANCE BILLS DISCOUNTED, COPIES OF RRS / LRS / AIRWAY BILLS EVIDENCENG DESPATCH OF GOODS TOGETHER WITH RELEVANT INVOICES, RECEIPTED CHALLANS / DELIVERY NOTES ETC., 17 02022017.V1I ICICI BANK SHOULD ACCOMPANY THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE. IN CASE OF DOCUMENTARY USANCE BILLS DISCOUNTED, THE BILLS OF EXCHANGE COVERING DISPATCH OF GOODS SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED BY INVOICES, RRS / LRS OF APPROVED TRANSPORT OPERATORS AND OTHER DOCUMENTS. BILLS WILL BE DRAWN ON GOVERNMENT DEPARTMENTS, CORPORATIONS, REPUTED PUBLIC AND PRIVATE SECTOR UNDERTAKINGS. DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY I.E., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDING UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES: FIRST PARI PASSU CHARGE WITH CONSORTIUM BANKERS BY WAY OF HYPOTHECATION IN FAVOUR OF THE BANK ON THE BORROWER'S ENTIRE STOCKS OF RAW MATERIALS, WORK-IN-PROCESS, SEMI-FINISHED AND FINISHED GOODS, CONSUMABLE STORES AND SPARES AND SUCH OTHER MOVABLES INCLUDING BOOK DEBTS, BILLS, WHETHER DOCUMENTARY OR CLEAN, BOTH PRESENT AND FUTURE. SPECIAL TERMS: SR. PARTICULARS SPECIAL TERM/CONDITION NO 1. OFAC - A) THE BORROWER HEREBY REPRESENTS AND WARRANTS THAT: NEITHER THE BORROWER NOR ANY OTHER PERSON BENEFITING IN ANY CAPACITY IN CONNECTION WITH OR FROM THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT AND/OR ANY INSTRUMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS THEREUNDER IS A SPECIALLY DESIGNATED NATIONAL (SDN) AND/OR OTHERWISE SANCTIONED, UNDER THE SANCTIONS PROMULGATED BY THE UNITED STATES (INCLUDING ITS OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL'S (OFAC))), INDIA, UNITED STATES, UNITED NATIONS, EUROPEAN UNION, THE JURISDICTION OF THE FACILITY OFFICE AND/OR ANY OTHER COUNTRY (COLLECTIVELY, THE "SANCTIONS"). B) THE BORROWER HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGES, COVENANTS AND AGREES THAT: I. THE SANCTIONS MAY BECOME APPLICABLE WITH RESPECT TO THE SAID FACILITIES AND/OR TRANSACTIONS THEREUNDER, 27 2022017.V1W ICICI BANK INCLUDING TO ANY DOCUMENTARY CREDITS AND/OR GUARANTEES ISSUED AND/OR DISBURSEMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS MADE BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT. SANCTIONS MAY PERTAIN INTER ALIA, TO THE PURPOSE AND/OR END USE OF THE SAID FACILITIES, GOODS MANUFACTURED IN OR ORIGINATED FROM/THROUGH CERTAIN COUNTRIES, SHIPMENT FROM/TO/USING CERTAIN COUNTRIES, PORTS, VESSELS, LINERS AND/OR DUE TO INVOLVEMENT OF CERTAIN PERSONS AND ENTITIES (INCLUDING CORRESPONDENT BANKS AND THE FACILITY OFFICE). CONSEQUENTLY, DISBURSEMENT, ISSUANCE, PAYMENT AND/OR PROCESSING UNDER THE SAID FACILITIES BY ICICI BANK MAY BECOME SUBJECTED TO THE SANCTIONS AND ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO REFUSE TO PROCESS ANY TRANSACTIONS THAT VIOLATE/MAY VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS. II. IT SHALL ENSURE THAT THE TRANSACTIONS ENTERED INTO PURSUANT TO THE SANCTION LETTER/ CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT DO NOT VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS AND THAT NO PERSONS, ENTITIES OR OTHERWISE, CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS ARE INVOLVED IN ANY TRANSACTIONS HEREUNDER. THE BORROWER AGREES THAT IT SHALL NOT AVAIL OF THE SAID FACILITIES OR USE THE PROCEEDS OF THE SAID FACILITIES IN ANY TRANSACTION WITH, OR FOR THE PURPOSE OF FINANCING THE ACTIVITIES OF, ANY PERSON CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS AS AFORESAID. IIT IT SHALL INDEMNIFY AND HOLD HARMLESS ICICI BANK, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, FOR ALL LOSSES AND LIABILITIES (INCLUDING DUE TO CLAIMS BY A THIRD PARTY), INCURRED BY ICICI BANK AS A RESULT OF ANY BREACH BY IT OF ITS REPRESENTATIONS AND UNDERTAKINGS CONTAINED HEREIN PERTAINING TO THE SANCTIONS AND/OR DUE TO ANY ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE SANCTIONS. NO ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT, INCLUDING GRANT OF THE SAID FACILITIES, ISSUANCE OF ANY FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS THERE UNDER OR PROCESSING OF ANY B. CIC! 28 02022017.V1G ICICI BANK PAYMENTS OR TRANSACTIONS, NOR ANY ACTION TAKEN BY THE BORROWER IN RELATION THERETO, SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE A WAIVER OF ANY OF ICICI BANK'S RIGHTS UNDER ANY PROVISIONS OF THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY CICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT RELATED TO THE SANCTIONS NOR SHALL THEY ACT TO RELIEVE THE BORROWER OF ITS OBLIGATIONS OR LIABILITIES IN RELATION THERETO. THE BORROWER HEREBY AGREES AND CONFIRMS THAT ANY BREACH OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS STIPULATED HEREIN ABOVE SHALL CONSTITUTE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK. 2 . HEDGING CLAUSE THE BORROWER REPRESENTS THAT IT HAS ADOPTED A SUITABLE HEDGING POLICY, APPROVED BY ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS PARTNERS/ PROPRIETOR/ TRUSTEE/ MEMBERS, WHICH INCLUDES MECHANISMS TO REDUCE ITS CURRENCY MISMATCHES. THE BORROWER'S HEDGING POLICY SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND UPDATED FROM TIME TO TIME, TILL ALL THE MONIES DUE AND PAYABLE UNDER THE FACILITY AGREEMENT/ TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS ARE FULLY PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF THE BANK/ LENDER. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE ALL INFORMATION AS MAY BE REQUIRED BY THE BANK/ LENDER ON A QUARTERLY BASIS OR FROM TIME TO TIME IN RELATION TO ITS FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURES AND HEDGING DETAILS IN RELATION THERETO. IN THE EVENT OF ANY CHANGE IN APPLICABLE LAWS/ REGULATIONS (INCLUDING REGULATORY/STATUTORY REQUIREMENTS PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE), THE BANK/ LENDER SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO RECOVER THE COST, IN ANY MANNER THAT IT DEEMS FIT, INCLUDING BY WAY OF REVISION IN SPREAD/APPLICABLE RATE. IF THE BORROWER HAS UNHEDGED FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURE, THEN THE BANK WILL RESERVE A RIGHT TO INCREASE THE PRICING. 3. UNCONDITIONAL NOTWITHSTANDING ANYTHING CONTAINED IN THE TRANSACTION CANCELLATION CLAUSE DOCUMENTS, THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO CANCEL THE UNUTILIZED PORTION OF THE FACILITY, IN WHOLE OR IN PART, AT ANY TIME DURING THE SUBSISTENCE OF THE FACILITY, WITHOUT GIVING ANY PRIOR NOTICE TO THE BORROWER, FOR ANY REASON WHATSOEVER, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, ON THE OCCURRENCE OF DETERIORATION OF CREDITWORTHINESS OF THE ICICI BA 29 02022017.V1WICICI BANK BORROWER, OR FOR NONCOMPLIANCE OF ANY TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS. FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE, 'DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS' SHALL INCLUDE WITHOUT LIMITATION; THE FOLLOWING EVENTS: (I) DOWNGRADE THE RATING OF THE BORROWER BY A CREDIT RATING AGENCY; (II INCLUSION OF THE BORROWER AND/OR ANY OF ITS DIRECTORS IN THE RBI'S WILLFUL DEFAULTERS LIST; (III) CLOSURE OF A SIGNIFICANT PORTION OF THE BORROWER'S OPERATING CAPACITY; (IV) DECLINE IN THE PROFIT AFTER TAX OF THE BORROWER BY MORE THAN FIFTEEN PERCENT; ( V ) ANY ADVERSE COMMENT FROM AN AUDITOR; AND (VI) ANY OTHER REASON/EVENT IN THE OPINION OF THE BANK, CONSTITUTING OR WHICH MAY CONSTITUTE, DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS THE BORROWER UNCONDITIONALLY AGREES, UNDERTAKES TO GET ITSELF RATED BY CREDIT RATING AGENCY/IES WITHIN A PERIOD OF SIX MONTHS AND/OR AT SUCH INTERVALS AS MAY BE DECIDED BY THE BANK, FAILING WHICH THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO REVIEW THE APPLICABLE INTEREST RATE AND/OR COSTS, CHARGES AND EXPENSES, WHICH SHALL BE PAYABLE BY THE BORROWER/OBLIGOR/SECURITY PROVIDER AND ON SUCH DATE/S OR WITHIN SUCH PERIOD AS MAY BE SPECIFIED BY THE BANK. "CREDIT RATING AGENCY" SHALL MEAN AND REFER TO THE DOMESTIC CREDIT ATING AGENCIES SUCH AS CREDIT ANALYSIS AND RESEARCH LIMITED, CRISIL LIMITED, INDIA RATINGS AND RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED, BRICKWORK RATINGS INDIA PVT. LIMITED, SME RATING AGENCY OF INDIA LIMITED AND ICRA LIMITED AND INTERNATIONAL CREDIT RATING AGENCIES SUCH AS FITCH, MOODYS AND STANDARD & POOR'S AND SUCH OTHER CREDIT RATING AGENCIES IDENTIFIED AND/OR RECOGNIZED BY THE RESERVE BANK OF INDIA FROM TIME TO TIME.
