APPOINTMENT OF | UPON THE HAPPENING OF ANY OF THE EVENTS OF DEFAULT, WHERE THE NOMINEE BORROWER IS A BODY CORPORATE (EXCLUDING CO-OPERATIVE SOCIETY), DIRECTOR (S) ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO APPOINT AND REMOVE FROM TIME TO TIME, DIRECTOR(S) ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE BORROWER (SUCH DIRECTORS SHALL BE REFERRED TO AS "NOMINEE DIRECTOR(S)") AND THE BORROWER SHALL AMEND ITS CONSTITUTIONAL DOCUMENTS AND EXECUTE SUCH OTHER DOCUMENTS, IF SO REQUIRED 38 2022017.V1BY ICICI BANK, IN ITS SOLE DISCRETION; 2. BASEL- IL CLAUSE ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE AN UNCONDITIONAL AND UNFETTERED RIGHT TO CANCEL THE OUTSTANDING UN-DRAWN COMMITMENTS UNDER THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS AT ANY TIME DURING THE CURRENCY OF THE FACILITY ADVANCED UNDER THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS WITHOUT GIVING ANY PRIOR NOTICE TO THE BORROWER. 3. CONSEQUENCES OF ICICI BANK MAY, AT ITS SOLE DISCRETION, RECALL OR ACCELERATE THE EVENT OF DEFAULTS FACILITY, IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER HAS COMMITTED DEFAULT UNDER THE AGREEMENT IN THE OPINION OF THE ICICI BANK AND/ OR ICICI BANK HAS REASONABLE APPREHENSION ABOUT THE BORROWER COMMITTING DEFAULT UNDER THE AGREEMENT. 4. PROVISIONS RELATING THE BORROWER AND / OR ANY OTHER PERSON ("SECURITY PROVIDER") TO INSURANCE WHO HAS PROVIDED / AGREED TO PROVIDE THE SECURITY FOR THE APPLICABLE TO FACILITY SHALL KEEP / CAUSE TO KEEP INSURED THE ASSETS CHARGED / SECURED ASSETS TO BE CHARGED TO ICICI BANK AGAINST, UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED IN THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("CAL") OR ANY AMENDMENT THERETO OR THE SANCTION LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK, SUCH RISKS AS MAY BE SPECIFIED BY ICICI BANK FROM TIME TO TIME. THE SECURITY PROVIDER SHALL DULY PAY / CAUSE TO BE PAID ALL PREMIA AND OTHER SUMS PAYABLE FOR THE AFORESAID PURPOSE. THE INSURANCE IN RESPECT OF THE AFORESAID ASSETS SHALL BE TAKEN IN THE JOINT NAMES OF THE SECURITY PROVIDER AND ICICI BANK AND ANY OTHER PERSON OR INSTITUTION HAVING AN INSURABLE INTEREST IN THE ASSETS (PURSUANT TO THE APPROVAL OF ICICI BANK) AND ACCEPTABLE TO ICICI BANK OR ICICI BANK'S NAME SHOULD BE NOTED AS FIRST LOSS PAYEE ON SUCH INSURANCE POLICIES. PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THERE SHALL, BE NO OBLIGATION ON ICICI BANK TO PAY THE INSURANCE PREMIA IN CASE THE BORROWER / SECURITY PROVIDER FAILS TO PAY THE SAME AND IT SHALL BE A TERM OF SUCH POLICY THAT ICICI BANK SHALL NOT BE DEEMED TO HAVE ANY OBLIGATION OR LIABILITY AS A RESULT OF BEING A CO-INSURED. THE BORROWER AGREES THAT, IN THE EVENT OF FAILURE ON THE PART OF THE BORROWER / THE SECURITY PROVIDER TO INSURE THE ASSETS OR TO PAY THE INSURANCE PREMIA OR OTHER SUMS REFERRED TO ABOVE, ICICI BANK MAY AT ITS SOLE DISCRETION GET THE ASSETS INSURED OR * 39 32027017.V1PAY THE INSURANCE PREMIA AND OTHER SUMS REFERRED TO ABOVE, AS THE CASE MAY BE, THEN THE SUMS SO PAID BY ICICI BANK WILL BE REIMBURSED / CAUSED TO BE REIMBURSED BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK TOGETHER WITH INTEREST THEREON, IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE TERMS OF THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS AND/ OR THE CAL . THE BORROWER SHALL DELIVER / CAUSE TO BE DELIVERED TO ICICI BANK PROMPTLY AND IN NO EVENT, LATER THAN 10 DAYS AFTER THE SAME ARE ISSUED, ORIGINALS OF ALL POLICIES OF INSURANCE AND RENEWALS THEREOF AND ENDORSEMENTS THERETO. 5. PROVISIONS RELATING | THE PROVISIONS RELATING TO PLEDGE LEDGE OF MOVABLE ASSETS IF DETAILED PLEDGE OF MOVABLE IN THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS SHALL APPLY MUTATIS MUTANDIS TO ASSETS THE FACILITY TO BE ADVANCED BY ICICI BANK 6. UNDERTAKINGS I) IN CASE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES, THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE FOLLOWING UNDERTAKING BEFORE AVAILING THE DISBURSEMENT UNDER THE FACILITY, IF APPLICABLE: A) UNDERTAKING FOR CREATION OF PERMANENT SECURITY (APPLICABLE ONLY WHEN ICICI BANK HAS PROVIDED TIMELINE FOR CREATION OF SECURITY IN ITS FAVOUR) AND POWER OF ATTORNEY; B) UNDERTAKING TO PAY ADDITIONAL INTEREST; 7. IT PERMISSION|THE BORROWER/ THIRD PARTY SECURITY PROVIDER SHALL FURNISH, BEFORE UNDER SECTION 281 AVAILING DISBURSEMENT UNDER THE FACILITY, PERMISSION/ NO- (1) (1I) OBJECTION CERTIFICATE FROM THE ASSESSING OFFICER, INCOME TAX DEPARTMENT UNDER SECTION 281(1) (II) OF INCOME TAX ACT, 1961 FOR CREATING CHARGE ON THE ASSETS OF THE BORROWER / THIRD PARTY SECURITY PROVIDER IN FAVOUR OF ICICI BANK. 8. WILLFUL DEFAULTER NEITHER THE BORROWER NOR ANY DIRECTOR, PARTNER, MEMBER OR CLAUSE TRUSTEE OF THE BORROWER HAS BEEN DECLARED TO BE A WILLFUL DEFAULTER. THE BORROWER SHALL NOT INDUCT A PERSON IN THE CAPACITY OF DIRECTOR / PROMOTER WHO IS A DIRECTOR / PARTNER / MEMBER / TRUSTEE OF A COMPANY / FIRM / ASSOCIATION OF PERSONS TRUST AS THE CASE MAY BE, IDENTIFIED AS WILLFUL DEFAULTER. IN THE EVENT OF SUCH A PERSON IS FOUND TO BE A DIRECTOR / PARTNER / MEMBER / TRUSTEE OF A COMPANY / FIRM / ASSOCIATION OF PERSONS / TRUST AS THE CASE MAY BE, IDENTIFIED AS WILLFUL DEFAULTER, THE BORROWER SHALL TAKE EXPEDITIOUS AND EFFECTIVE STEPS FOR REMOVAL OF SUCH PERSON. 9. RAJENDRA JAIN, WHOLE TIME DIRECTOR DEAR SIR/S: SUB: RENEWAL OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES WE REFER TO THE CREDIT FACILITY/IES IN THE FORM OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITY ("FACILITY/IES", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) GRANTED TO YOU BY ICICI BANK LIMITED ("ICICI BANK"), PURSUANT TO A CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER INCLUDING ANY AMENDMENTS THEREOF ("CAL", DETAILS WHEREOF ARE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO) AND OTHER FACILITY DOCUMENTS, EXECUTED IN CONNECTION THEREWITH ("TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS"). WE ARE PLEASED TO INFORM THAT THE ICICI BANK, AT YOUR REQUEST, HAS RENEWED THE FACILITY/IES ON THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS AS SET OUT IN THE ANNEXURE HERETO FOR A FURTHER PERIOD UP TO THE DATE MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE. A PROCESSING FEE AS MENTIONED IN THE ANNEXURE SHALL BE CHARGED AND DEBITED FROM YOUR ACCOUNT TOWARDS RENEWAL OF THE FACILITY/IES. THIS RENEWAL CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("RENEWAL CAL ") SHALL BE READ IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND TO THE EXTENT OF ANY INCONSISTENCY BETWEEN THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS AND THIS RENEWAL CAL, THE PROVISIONS OF THIS RENEWAL CAL SHALL PREVAIL. ALL THE EXISTING SECURITY AND/OR CONTRACTUAL COMFORT, IF ANY, IN RESPECT OF THE FACILITY/IES, SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND CONTINUE TO SECURE THE FACILITY/IES, NOTWITHSTANDING REVISION/S, IF ANY. AS ON DATE THE I-MCLR-6M IS 8.15% AND SPREAD IS 0.85%. ICICI BANK SHALL RESET THE ABOVE INTEREST RATE, AT THE END OF EVERY 6 MONTHS FROM THE ACCOUNT OPENING DATE/LIMIT SET-UP DATE/RENEWAL DATE AS A SUM OF I-MCLR-6M PLUS "SPREAD", PREVAILING ON THE RESET DATE PLUS APPLICABLE STATUTORY LEVY, IF ANY IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS' PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: O THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY I.E., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDINGS UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; O OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. . ALL APPROVALS ARE TRANSACTION SPECIFIC. . DIRECT DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY EXPORTERS WITH OVERSEAS BANKS AND / OR ANY AGENCY WILL BE DONE ONLY THROUGH THE BRANCH OF ICICI BANK DESIGNATED FOR THIS PURPOSE. DISBURSEMENT IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WOULD BE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY OF FOREX. . IF ANY PCFC / EPC HAS BEEN AVAILED AGAINST THE SAME UNDERLYING DOCUMENT, THEN THE SAME OUTSTANDING WILL BE ADJUSTED FROM THE PROCEEDS OF PSCFC. ALL FACILITIES IN FOREIGN CURRENCY WILL BE GOVERNED BY RBI / FEMA 11 32022017.V1P ICICI BANK GUIDELINES. THE FACILITY WILL BE DISBURSED EITHER BY WAY OF NEGOTIATION / DISCOUNTING OF BILLS UNDER EXPORT LETTER OF CREDITS ISSUED TO BSL OR PURCHASE OF BILLS (LC / NON-LC) UNDER THIS SANCTIONED LIMIT. PENAL RATE OF INTEREST: BEFORE DELINKING / CRYSTALLIZATION OF BILL (SINGAPORE: ON 4TH DAY AFTER DUE DATE; BAHRAIN: ON 31ST DAY AFTER DUE DATE): USD PRIME RATE + 2% AFTER DELINKING / CRYSTALLIZATION OF BILL: FROM 4TH DAY FOR SINGAPORE EBRD AND 31ST DAY FOR BAHRAIN EBRD: 12.25% MARGIN INVENTORY UNIFORM MARGIN OF 25% AGAINST ALL COMPONENTS OF INVENTORY BOOK DEBT: COVER PERIOD: 90 DAYS MARGIN : 10% INTERCHANGEABILITY | FULL TWO-WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY BETWEEN PCFC AND EPC/PSCFC/FUBD/FBP TWO WAY INTERCHANGEABILITY FROM FUND BASED TO NON-FUND BASED SPECIFIC SECURITY AGAINST DOCUMENTS OF TITLE TO GOODS VIZ., BILLS OF LADING / AWBS, BILLS OF EXCHANGE, INVOICES, PACKING LISTS, CERTIFICATES OF ORIGIN ETC. GENERAL (IF COMPANY WILL OBTAIN ECGC'S SHIPMENTS (COMPREHENSIVE RISKS) APPLICABLE) POLICY FOR POST - SHIPMENT CREDIT AT ITS EXPENSE. BILLS DRAWN ON WOS / JVS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO 50% OF FBP / FUBD LIMITS. IF FELT NECESSARY, PURCHASE / DISCOUNTING OF EXPORT BILLS BY THE BANK WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE EXTENT OF CREDIT LIMIT SANCTIONED BY ECGC ON THE OVERSEAS BUYERS INDIVIDUALLY. IF FELT NECESSARY, DISCOUNTING / PURCHASE OF EXPORT BILLS WILL BE SUBJECTED TO AVAILABILITY OF "SATISFACTORY" OPINION REPORTS FROM BANKS / AGENCIES OVERSEAS. INLAND BILLS PURCHASED / DISCOUNTED: FACILITY NAME FSCM - ONLINE INLAND CLEAN BILL DISCOUNTING (BOTH SALES AND PURCHASE) THIS FACILITY IS AVAILABLE ONLINE TO THE BORROWER THROUGH CORPORATE INTERNET BANKING UNDER FINANCIAL SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT (FSCM) MODULE ALONE OR THROUGH FSCM AND HOST TO HOST MODULE ("H2H") JOINTLY. DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 3 MONTHS AND UPTO 6 MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-6M DRAWALS FOR GREATER THAN 6 MONTH TENURE: 1-MCLR-1Y IN CASE OF ANY CHANGE IN THE REGULATORY REQUIREMENTS BY THE REGULATOR APPLICABLE TO THE FACILITY PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE, THEN ICICI BANK MAY REVISE THE SPREAD TO REFLECT THE REGULATORY CHANGE, SUBJECT TO EXTANT RBI GUIDELINES. THE BORROWER WILL HAVE THE OPTION TO PREPAY THE INDIVIDUAL DRAWAL, WITHOUT ANY PREPAYMENT PENALTY, DURING 60 DAYS PRIOR TO THE SCHEDULED MATURITY DATE OF THE DRAWAL OR DURING RESIDUAL TENURE NOT GREATER THAN 1/3RD OF THE ORIGINAL TENURE (IN DAYS), WHICHEVER IS LONGER IN DURATION, PROVIDED THAT AT LEAST 5 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE TO PREPAY THE LOAN HAS BEEN GIVEN BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK. UNLESS SPECIFIED OTHERWISE IN THE DOCUMENTS IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY, IF THE BORROWER WISHES TO PREPAY ANY PART OF OR WHOLE OF THE FACILITY, IT MAY DO SO WITH PAYMENT OF PREPAYMENT PREMIUM OF 0.25% ON PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF THE LOAN BEING PREPAID SUBJECT TO THE BORROWER GIVING AT LEAST 15 DAYS PRIOR IRREVOCABLE WRITTEN NOTICE OF THE SAME TO ICICI BANK. - LINE * 13 02022017.V1V ICICI BANK OVERDUE INTEREST: 2.00% P.A. OVER THE DOCUMENT RATE. INTEREST IN CASE OF BILLS RETURNED UNPAID WILL BE 6.00% FOR THE DOCUMENT RATE FROM THE DATE OF PURCHASE OF THE BILL SECURITY AS PER SECURITY TEMPLATE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES CONDITION THE BANK RESERVES RIGHT TO VERIFY UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS PHYSICALLY PRECEDENTS / INCLUDING COPIES OF THE INVOICE(S) AND ANY KIND OF TRANSPORT CONDITION DOCUMENTS SHOWING PROOF OF MOVEMENT OF GOODS. THIS VERIFICATION SUBSEQUENT SHALL BE CARRIED OUT ON QUARTERLY BASIS ON RANDOMLY SELECTED SPECIAL TRANSACTIONS OR AS AND WHEN ICICI BANK SO DEMANDS. CONDITIONS GENERAL THE INVOICE(S) WILL BE DISCOUNTED WITH RECOURSE TO THE BORROWER INVOICES WHICH ARE MORE THAN 6 MONTHS OLD SHALL NOT BE CONSIDERED FOR THE FACILITY ICICI BANK RESERVES THE RIGHT TO DEMAND UNDERLYING DOCUMENTS ON ACCOUNT OF REGULATORY REQUIREMENT OR ITS INTERNAL POLICIES ICICI BANK WILL PROVIDE THE FACILITY ONLY WHEN THE FILE CONTAINING THE DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ("FILE") IS / AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER OR DETAILS OF THE INVOICES ARE ENTERED IN THE FSCM SYSTEM MANUALLY AND AUTO ACCEPTED BY THE PURCHASER (AS DETAILED IN THE DEAL STRUCTURE BELOW) AND THEREAFTER DISBURSE THE FUNDS TO THE BORROWER. THE BORROWER SHALL INFORM ITS WORKING CAPITAL BANKERS ABOUT THE SANCTION OF THE FACILITY BREACH OF ANY REPRESENTATION, WARRANTY OR COVENANT SPECIFIED HEREIN OR ANY OTHER TRANSACTION DOCUMENT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE / GIVE 7 DAYS ADVANCE WRITTEN NOTICE TO ICICI BANK IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER AND / OR THE PURCHASER DECIDE TO TERMINATE THE AGREEMENT BETWEEN THEM. SUCH TERMINATION MAY, AT THE SOLE DISCRETION OF ICICI BANK, BE TREATED AS AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE FACILITY. IN SUCH AN EVENT, THE OBLIGATIONS OF THE BORROWER SHALL CONTINUE TO EXIST IN RELATION TO THE FACILITY UNLESS ALL MONIES IN RESPECT OF THE SAME ARE PAID TO ICICI BANK, TO ITS SATISFACTION. APPLICABLE REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES: A) THAT THE DETAILS OF INVOICE(S) SUBMITTED-TO-ICICI BANK FOR 14 2022017.V1PICICI BANK DISCOUNTING REPRESENT GENUINE SALES TRANSACTIONS OF GOODS/SERVICES; O) THAT THE AMOUNTS OF SUCH INVOICE(S) TRULY REPRESENT THE VALUE OF THE GOODS SO TRANSPORTED/SHIPPED; C) THAT SALE OF GOODS/SERVICES FOR WHICH THE BORROWER IS AVAILING THE FACILITY FROM ICICI BANK HAS NOT BEEN CONDUCTED BETWEEN RELATED PARTIES OF THE BORROWER LIKE GROUP COMPANIES, ASSOCIATED COMPANIES, HOUSE FIRMS AND IDENTICAL COMPANIES. D) THAT THE OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER THE FACILITY WILL BE DEDUCTED AT THE TIME OF CALCULATING THE VALUE OF THE RECEIVABLES OF THE BORROWER TILL THE TIME THE SAID AMOUNT IS PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF ICICI BANK. DRAWINGS WILL BE RESTRICTED TO THE LOWER OF: THE ACTUAL VALUE OF STOCKS AND STOCKS-IN-TRANSIT IN EFFECTIVE CUSTODY I.E., HYPOTHECATION MEANT FOR PROCESSING AND EXPORT LESS USUAL MARGINS AND OUTSTANDING UNDER USANCE LETTERS OF CREDIT; OUTSTANDING AMOUNT UNDER CONFIRMED LETTERS OF CREDIT AND /OR FIRM CONTRACTS ON HAND, WHICHEVER IS LOWER. "I/WE DO HEREBY CONFIRM THAT THIS LC SHALL NOT BE UTILIZED FOR ANY TRANSACTIONS INVOLVING RELATED PARTIES, UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED IN THIS DOCUMENT. I/WE DO HEREBY UNDERTAKE TO KEEP THE BANK FULLY INDEMNIFIED, SAVED AND HARMLESS OF, FROM OR AGAINST ANY DIRECT OR INDIRECT LOSS, DAMAGE OR RISK THAT MAY ARISE/CAUSE TO ICICI BANK ON ACCOUNT OF ANY MISREPRESENTATION ON OUR PART UNDER THIS CLAUSE AND DO HEREBY AGREE TO MAKE GOOD TO ICICI BANK, ANY / ALL SUCH LOSSES, COSTS OR DAMAGES, EXPENSES AND CLAIMS/ACTIONS. FOR THE PURPOSES OF THIS CLAUSE, THE TERM "RELATED PARTIES" SHALL BE DEEMED TO HAVE THE MEANING AS ASSIGNED TO IT UNDER SECTION 2 (76) OF THE COMPANIES ACT, 2013." THE LAST DATE OF NEGOTIATION OF ANY LC UNDER THE FACILITY CANNOT EXCEED 3 YEARS FROM THE EXPIRY OF THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY. SECURITY TEMPLATE FOR WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES: FIRST PARI PASSU CHARGE WITH CONSORTIUM BANKERS BY WAY OF HYPOTHECATION IN FAVOUR OF THE BANK ON THE BORROWER'S ENTIRE STOCKS OF RAW MATERIALS, WORK-IN-PROCESS, SEMI-FINISHED AND FINISHED GOODS, CONSUMABLE STORES AND SPARES AND SUCH OTHER MOVABLES INCLUDING BOOK DEBTS, BILLS, WHETHER DOCUMENTARY OR CLEAN, BOTH PRESENT AND FUTURE. SPECIAL TERMS: SR. PARTICULARS SPECIAL TERM/CONDITION NO 1. OFAC - A) THE BORROWER HEREBY REPRESENTS AND WARRANTS THAT: NEITHER THE BORROWER NOR ANY OTHER PERSON BENEFITING IN ANY CAPACITY IN CONNECTION WITH OR FROM THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT AND/OR ANY INSTRUMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS THEREUNDER IS A SPECIALLY DESIGNATED NATIONAL (SDN) AND/OR OTHERWISE SANCTIONED, UNDER THE SANCTIONS PROMULGATED BY THE UNITED STATES (INCLUDING ITS OFFICE OF FOREIGN ASSETS CONTROL'S (OFAC))), INDIA, UNITED STATES, UNITED NATIONS, EUROPEAN UNION, THE JURISDICTION OF THE FACILITY OFFICE AND/OR ANY OTHER COUNTRY (COLLECTIVELY, THE "SANCTIONS"). B) THE BORROWER HEREBY ACKNOWLEDGES, COVENANTS AND AGREES THAT: I. THE SANCTIONS MAY BECOME APPLICABLE WITH RESPECT TO THE SAID FACILITIES AND/OR TRANSACTIONS THEREUNDER, 27 2022017.V1W ICICI BANK INCLUDING TO ANY DOCUMENTARY CREDITS AND/OR GUARANTEES ISSUED AND/OR DISBURSEMENTS AND/OR PAYMENTS MADE BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT. SANCTIONS MAY PERTAIN INTER ALIA, TO THE PURPOSE AND/OR END USE OF THE SAID FACILITIES, GOODS MANUFACTURED IN OR ORIGINATED FROM/THROUGH CERTAIN COUNTRIES, SHIPMENT FROM/TO/USING CERTAIN COUNTRIES, PORTS, VESSELS, LINERS AND/OR DUE TO INVOLVEMENT OF CERTAIN PERSONS AND ENTITIES (INCLUDING CORRESPONDENT BANKS AND THE FACILITY OFFICE). CONSEQUENTLY, DISBURSEMENT, ISSUANCE, PAYMENT AND/OR PROCESSING UNDER THE SAID FACILITIES BY ICICI BANK MAY BECOME SUBJECTED TO THE SANCTIONS AND ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO REFUSE TO PROCESS ANY TRANSACTIONS THAT VIOLATE/MAY VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS. II. IT SHALL ENSURE THAT THE TRANSACTIONS ENTERED INTO PURSUANT TO THE SANCTION LETTER/ CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT DO NOT VIOLATE ANY SANCTIONS AND THAT NO PERSONS, ENTITIES OR OTHERWISE, CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS ARE INVOLVED IN ANY TRANSACTIONS HEREUNDER. THE BORROWER AGREES THAT IT SHALL NOT AVAIL OF THE SAID FACILITIES OR USE THE PROCEEDS OF THE SAID FACILITIES IN ANY TRANSACTION WITH, OR FOR THE PURPOSE OF FINANCING THE ACTIVITIES OF, ANY PERSON CURRENTLY SUBJECT TO ANY SANCTIONS AS AFORESAID. IIT IT SHALL INDEMNIFY AND HOLD HARMLESS ICICI BANK, TO THE FULLEST EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW, FOR ALL LOSSES AND LIABILITIES (INCLUDING DUE TO CLAIMS BY A THIRD PARTY), INCURRED BY ICICI BANK AS A RESULT OF ANY BREACH BY IT OF ITS REPRESENTATIONS AND UNDERTAKINGS CONTAINED HEREIN PERTAINING TO THE SANCTIONS AND/OR DUE TO ANY ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE SANCTIONS. NO ACTION TAKEN BY ICICI BANK PURSUANT TO THE WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT, INCLUDING GRANT OF THE SAID FACILITIES, ISSUANCE OF ANY FINANCIAL INSTRUMENTS THERE UNDER OR PROCESSING OF ANY B. CIC! 28 02022017.V1G ICICI BANK PAYMENTS OR TRANSACTIONS, NOR ANY ACTION TAKEN BY THE BORROWER IN RELATION THERETO, SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE A WAIVER OF ANY OF ICICI BANK'S RIGHTS UNDER ANY PROVISIONS OF THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY CICI BANK OR WORKING CAPITAL CONSORTIUM AGREEMENT RELATED TO THE SANCTIONS NOR SHALL THEY ACT TO RELIEVE THE BORROWER OF ITS OBLIGATIONS OR LIABILITIES IN RELATION THERETO. THE BORROWER HEREBY AGREES AND CONFIRMS THAT ANY BREACH OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS STIPULATED HEREIN ABOVE SHALL CONSTITUTE AN EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK. 2 . HEDGING CLAUSE THE BORROWER REPRESENTS THAT IT HAS ADOPTED A SUITABLE HEDGING POLICY, APPROVED BY ITS BOARD OF DIRECTORS PARTNERS/ PROPRIETOR/ TRUSTEE/ MEMBERS, WHICH INCLUDES MECHANISMS TO REDUCE ITS CURRENCY MISMATCHES. THE BORROWER'S HEDGING POLICY SHALL REMAIN IN FULL FORCE AND EFFECT AND UPDATED FROM TIME TO TIME, TILL ALL THE MONIES DUE AND PAYABLE UNDER THE FACILITY AGREEMENT/ TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS ARE FULLY PAID TO THE SATISFACTION OF THE BANK/ LENDER. THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE ALL INFORMATION AS MAY BE REQUIRED BY THE BANK/ LENDER ON A QUARTERLY BASIS OR FROM TIME TO TIME IN RELATION TO ITS FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURES AND HEDGING DETAILS IN RELATION THERETO. IN THE EVENT OF ANY CHANGE IN APPLICABLE LAWS/ REGULATIONS (INCLUDING REGULATORY/STATUTORY REQUIREMENTS PERTAINING TO PROVISIONING NORMS AND/OR RISK WEIGHTAGE), THE BANK/ LENDER SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO RECOVER THE COST, IN ANY MANNER THAT IT DEEMS FIT, INCLUDING BY WAY OF REVISION IN SPREAD/APPLICABLE RATE. IF THE BORROWER HAS UNHEDGED FOREIGN CURRENCY EXPOSURE, THEN THE BANK WILL RESERVE A RIGHT TO INCREASE THE PRICING. 3. UNCONDITIONAL NOTWITHSTANDING ANYTHING CONTAINED IN THE TRANSACTION CANCELLATION CLAUSE DOCUMENTS, THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE UNCONDITIONAL RIGHT TO CANCEL THE UNUTILIZED PORTION OF THE FACILITY, IN WHOLE OR IN PART, AT ANY TIME DURING THE SUBSISTENCE OF THE FACILITY, WITHOUT GIVING ANY PRIOR NOTICE TO THE BORROWER, FOR ANY REASON WHATSOEVER, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, ON THE OCCURRENCE OF DETERIORATION OF CREDITWORTHINESS OF THE ICICI BA 29 02022017.V1WICICI BANK BORROWER, OR FOR NONCOMPLIANCE OF ANY TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THE TRANSACTION DOCUMENTS. FOR THE PURPOSE OF THIS CLAUSE, 'DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS' SHALL INCLUDE WITHOUT LIMITATION; THE FOLLOWING EVENTS: (I) DOWNGRADE THE RATING OF THE BORROWER BY A CREDIT RATING AGENCY; (II INCLUSION OF THE BORROWER AND/OR ANY OF ITS DIRECTORS IN THE RBI'S WILLFUL DEFAULTERS LIST; (III) CLOSURE OF A SIGNIFICANT PORTION OF THE BORROWER'S OPERATING CAPACITY; (IV) DECLINE IN THE PROFIT AFTER TAX OF THE BORROWER BY MORE THAN FIFTEEN PERCENT; ( V ) ANY ADVERSE COMMENT FROM AN AUDITOR; AND (VI) ANY OTHER REASON/EVENT IN THE OPINION OF THE BANK, CONSTITUTING OR WHICH MAY CONSTITUTE, DETERIORATION IN THE CREDITWORTHINESS THE BORROWER UNCONDITIONALLY AGREES, UNDERTAKES TO GET ITSELF RATED BY CREDIT RATING AGENCY/IES WITHIN A PERIOD OF SIX MONTHS AND/OR AT SUCH INTERVALS AS MAY BE DECIDED BY THE BANK, FAILING WHICH THE BANK SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO REVIEW THE APPLICABLE INTEREST RATE AND/OR COSTS, CHARGES AND EXPENSES, WHICH SHALL BE PAYABLE BY THE BORROWER/OBLIGOR/SECURITY PROVIDER AND ON SUCH DATE/S OR WITHIN SUCH PERIOD AS MAY BE SPECIFIED BY THE BANK. "CREDIT RATING AGENCY" SHALL MEAN AND REFER TO THE DOMESTIC CREDIT ATING AGENCIES SUCH AS CREDIT ANALYSIS AND RESEARCH LIMITED, CRISIL LIMITED, INDIA RATINGS AND RESEARCH PRIVATE LIMITED, BRICKWORK RATINGS INDIA PVT. LIMITED, SME RATING AGENCY OF INDIA LIMITED AND ICRA LIMITED AND INTERNATIONAL CREDIT RATING AGENCIES SUCH AS FITCH, MOODYS AND STANDARD & POOR'S AND SUCH OTHER CREDIT RATING AGENCIES IDENTIFIED AND/OR RECOGNIZED BY THE RESERVE BANK OF INDIA FROM TIME TO TIME. APPOINTMENT OF | UPON THE HAPPENING OF ANY OF THE EVENTS OF DEFAULT, WHERE THE NOMINEE BORROWER IS A BODY CORPORATE (EXCLUDING CO-OPERATIVE SOCIETY), DIRECTOR (S) ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE THE RIGHT TO APPOINT AND REMOVE FROM TIME TO TIME, DIRECTOR(S) ON THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE BORROWER (SUCH DIRECTORS SHALL BE REFERRED TO AS "NOMINEE DIRECTOR(S)") AND THE BORROWER SHALL AMEND ITS CONSTITUTIONAL DOCUMENTS AND EXECUTE SUCH OTHER DOCUMENTS, IF SO REQUIRED 38 2022017.V1BY ICICI BANK, IN ITS SOLE DISCRETION; 2. BASEL- IL CLAUSE ICICI BANK SHALL HAVE AN UNCONDITIONAL AND UNFETTERED RIGHT TO CANCEL THE OUTSTANDING UN-DRAWN COMMITMENTS UNDER THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS AT ANY TIME DURING THE CURRENCY OF THE FACILITY ADVANCED UNDER THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS WITHOUT GIVING ANY PRIOR NOTICE TO THE BORROWER. 3. CONSEQUENCES OF ICICI BANK MAY, AT ITS SOLE DISCRETION, RECALL OR ACCELERATE THE EVENT OF DEFAULTS FACILITY, IN THE EVENT THE BORROWER HAS COMMITTED DEFAULT UNDER THE AGREEMENT IN THE OPINION OF THE ICICI BANK AND/ OR ICICI BANK HAS REASONABLE APPREHENSION ABOUT THE BORROWER COMMITTING DEFAULT UNDER THE AGREEMENT. 4. PROVISIONS RELATING THE BORROWER AND / OR ANY OTHER PERSON ("SECURITY PROVIDER") TO INSURANCE WHO HAS PROVIDED / AGREED TO PROVIDE THE SECURITY FOR THE APPLICABLE TO FACILITY SHALL KEEP / CAUSE TO KEEP INSURED THE ASSETS CHARGED / SECURED ASSETS TO BE CHARGED TO ICICI BANK AGAINST, UNLESS OTHERWISE SPECIFIED IN THE CREDIT ARRANGEMENT LETTER ("CAL") OR ANY AMENDMENT THERETO OR THE SANCTION LETTER ISSUED BY ICICI BANK, SUCH RISKS AS MAY BE SPECIFIED BY ICICI BANK FROM TIME TO TIME. THE SECURITY PROVIDER SHALL DULY PAY / CAUSE TO BE PAID ALL PREMIA AND OTHER SUMS PAYABLE FOR THE AFORESAID PURPOSE. THE INSURANCE IN RESPECT OF THE AFORESAID ASSETS SHALL BE TAKEN IN THE JOINT NAMES OF THE SECURITY PROVIDER AND ICICI BANK AND ANY OTHER PERSON OR INSTITUTION HAVING AN INSURABLE INTEREST IN THE ASSETS (PURSUANT TO THE APPROVAL OF ICICI BANK) AND ACCEPTABLE TO ICICI BANK OR ICICI BANK'S NAME SHOULD BE NOTED AS FIRST LOSS PAYEE ON SUCH INSURANCE POLICIES. PROVIDED, HOWEVER, THERE SHALL, BE NO OBLIGATION ON ICICI BANK TO PAY THE INSURANCE PREMIA IN CASE THE BORROWER / SECURITY PROVIDER FAILS TO PAY THE SAME AND IT SHALL BE A TERM OF SUCH POLICY THAT ICICI BANK SHALL NOT BE DEEMED TO HAVE ANY OBLIGATION OR LIABILITY AS A RESULT OF BEING A CO-INSURED. THE BORROWER AGREES THAT, IN THE EVENT OF FAILURE ON THE PART OF THE BORROWER / THE SECURITY PROVIDER TO INSURE THE ASSETS OR TO PAY THE INSURANCE PREMIA OR OTHER SUMS REFERRED TO ABOVE, ICICI BANK MAY AT ITS SOLE DISCRETION GET THE ASSETS INSURED OR * 39 32027017.V1PAY THE INSURANCE PREMIA AND OTHER SUMS REFERRED TO ABOVE, AS THE CASE MAY BE, THEN THE SUMS SO PAID BY ICICI BANK WILL BE REIMBURSED / CAUSED TO BE REIMBURSED BY THE BORROWER TO ICICI BANK TOGETHER WITH INTEREST THEREON, IN ACCORDANCE WITH THE TERMS OF THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS AND/ OR THE CAL . THE BORROWER SHALL DELIVER / CAUSE TO BE DELIVERED TO ICICI BANK PROMPTLY AND IN NO EVENT, LATER THAN 10 DAYS AFTER THE SAME ARE ISSUED, ORIGINALS OF ALL POLICIES OF INSURANCE AND RENEWALS THEREOF AND ENDORSEMENTS THERETO. 5. PROVISIONS RELATING | THE PROVISIONS RELATING TO PLEDGE LEDGE OF MOVABLE ASSETS IF DETAILED PLEDGE OF MOVABLE IN THE CONSORTIUM DOCUMENTS SHALL APPLY MUTATIS MUTANDIS TO ASSETS THE FACILITY TO BE ADVANCED BY ICICI BANK 6. UNDERTAKINGS I) IN CASE OF WORKING CAPITAL FACILITIES, THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE FOLLOWING UNDERTAKING BEFORE AVAILING THE DISBURSEMENT UNDER THE FACILITY, IF APPLICABLE: A) UNDERTAKING FOR CREATION OF PERMANENT SECURITY (APPLICABLE ONLY WHEN ICICI BANK HAS PROVIDED TIMELINE FOR CREATION OF SECURITY IN ITS FAVOUR) AND POWER OF ATTORNEY; B) UNDERTAKING TO PAY ADDITIONAL INTEREST; 7. IT PERMISSION|THE BORROWER/ THIRD PARTY SECURITY PROVIDER SHALL FURNISH, BEFORE UNDER SECTION 281 AVAILING DISBURSEMENT UNDER THE FACILITY, PERMISSION/ NO- (1) (1I) OBJECTION CERTIFICATE FROM THE ASSESSING OFFICER, INCOME TAX DEPARTMENT UNDER SECTION 281(1) (II) OF INCOME TAX ACT, 1961 FOR CREATING CHARGE ON THE ASSETS OF THE BORROWER / THIRD PARTY SECURITY PROVIDER IN FAVOUR OF ICICI BANK. 8. WILLFUL DEFAULTER NEITHER THE BORROWER NOR ANY DIRECTOR, PARTNER, MEMBER OR CLAUSE TRUSTEE OF THE BORROWER HAS BEEN DECLARED TO BE A WILLFUL DEFAULTER. THE BORROWER SHALL NOT INDUCT A PERSON IN THE CAPACITY OF DIRECTOR / PROMOTER WHO IS A DIRECTOR / PARTNER / MEMBER / TRUSTEE OF A COMPANY / FIRM / ASSOCIATION OF PERSONS TRUST AS THE CASE MAY BE, IDENTIFIED AS WILLFUL DEFAULTER. IN THE EVENT OF SUCH A PERSON IS FOUND TO BE A DIRECTOR / PARTNER / MEMBER / TRUSTEE OF A COMPANY / FIRM / ASSOCIATION OF PERSONS / TRUST AS THE CASE MAY BE, IDENTIFIED AS WILLFUL DEFAULTER, THE BORROWER SHALL TAKE EXPEDITIOUS AND EFFECTIVE STEPS FOR REMOVAL OF SUCH PERSON. 9. MORTGAGE CREATION: | THE BORROWER HEREBY AGREES THAT THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE OR DECLARATION FROM | ENSURE THAT THE THIRD PARTY SECURITY PROVIDER SHALL FURNISH, IF SO CICI E 40 02022017.V1WICICI BANK BORROWER/ THIRD REQUIRED BY ICICI BANK, A DECLARATION FOR CREATION OF SECURITY ON PARTY SECURITY THE IMMOVABLE PROPERTIES, IN THE FORMAT SPECIFIED BY ICICI BANK PROVIDER AND SHALL THEN HAND OVER THE TITLE DEEDS TO THE LEAD BANK OR SECURITY TRUSTEE OR ANY OTHER BANKS SO APPOINTED BY CONSORTIUM MEMBERS, INCLUDING ICICI BANK. 10. RESOLUTIONS THE BORROWER SHALL PROVIDE, BEFORE AVAILING DISBURSEMENT U/APPLICABLE UNDER THE FACILITY, SHAREHOLDERS' RESOLUTION UNDER SECTION SECTIONS OF 180(1) (A), SECTION 180(1)(C) AND SECTION 185/186 OF COMPANIES COMPANIES ACT ACT, 2013, AS APPLICABLE. 2013 11. LETTER OF THE BORROWER HEREBY AGREES AND COVENANTS THAT IT SHALL ACKNOWLEDGMENT PROVIDE LETTER OF ACKNOWLEDGMENT OF DEBT (LAD) TO ICICI BANK, OF DEBT (LAD) BEFORE EXPIRY OF THE VALIDITY PERIOD OF THE FACILITY. NON- COMPLIANCE OF THE SAID COVENANT SHALL BE DEEMED TO BE EVENT OF DEFAULT UNDER THIS CAL. FOR ICICI BANK LTD MS. KIRAN KOTAK * (AUTHORIZED SIGNATORY 21 01 2020 41
